GSP33brsgor2u:4: utpattyantavivarjitaścitivapurvyāpi ca kartāṃśako liṅgena prathito 'pi nāmatanukṛttaṃ jānakīśaṃ bhaje //2//
GSP33brsgor2u:8: karteti aṃśa iti ca prathitaḥ prasiddho yastaṃ pratyagabhinnaṃ paramātmānaṃ mūlaprakṛtiniyantāraṃ bhaje ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:14: evaṃ prathamādhyāyasyārthamanūdya tasmin viṣaye virodhaparihāraviṣayiṇaṃ dvitīyādhyāyasyārthaṃ pādaśaḥ saṃkṣipya kathayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:18: tṛtīyapāde prativedāntaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ jīvātmaśrutīnāṃ ca vyomādimahābhūtānāṃ janmalayakramādikathanenāvirodhaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:31: sa kiṃ sāṃkhyasmṛtyā virudhyate na veti smṛtiprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyābhyāṃ saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:33: tantryante vyutpādyante tattvānyaneneti tantraṃ śāstraṃ kapiloktam,
GSP33brsgor2u:38: nanu sāṃkhyasmṛtiprāmāṇyāya pradhānavādagrahe manvādismṛtīnāmaprāmāṇyaṃ syādityāśaṅkya tāsāṃ dharme sāvakāśatvātpramāṇyaṃ syādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:46: śrutivirodhe smṛtyaprāmāṇyasyeṣṭatvātpūrvapakṣo na yukta iti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:48: ye svātantryeṇa śrutyarthaṃ jñātuṃ śaknuvanti teṣāmayaṃ pūrvapakṣo na bhavet,
GSP33brsgor2u:56: yathā sāṃkhyasmṛtivirodhādbrahmavādastyājya iti tvayocyate tathā smṛtyantaravirodhātpradhānavādāstyājya iti mayocyata iti siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:69: nanu śrutivirodhaḥ kimiti nokta ityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:71: smṛtīnāṃ mitho virodhe kathaṃ tattvanirṇayaḥ, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:76: vastutattve smṛtīnāṃ mitho virodhe vastuni vikalpāyogāt kḷptaśrutimūlāḥ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:80: 'audumbarīṃ spṛṣṭvodgāyet'iti pratyakṣaśrutiviruddhā 'sā sarvā veṣṭayitavyā'iti smṛtirmānaṃ na veti saṃdehe,
GSP33brsgor2u:84: atra tu virodhe sati śrutyanumānāyogānmūlābhāvāt sarvaveṣṭanasmṛtirapramāṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:89: kapilādibhiḥ kilādau vedaprāmāṇyaṃ niścitya tadarthasya dharmasyānuṣṭhānena siddhiḥ saṃpāditā,
GSP33brsgor2u:90: tayā siddhyā praṇītasmṛtyanusāreṇānādiśrutipīḍā na yuktopajīvyavirodhāditi pariharati- na /
GSP33brsgor2u:93: śrutīnāṃ mukhyārthamatikramyopacaritārthatvaṃ śaṅkituṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:98: siddhānāṃ vacanamāśritya vedārthakalpanāyāmapi siddhoktīnāṃ mitho virodhe śrutyāśritamanvādyuktibhireva vedārthanirṇayo yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:100: nanu mandamateḥ sāṃkhyasmṛtau śraddhā bhavati tasya matirvedāntamārge kathamāneyetyata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:102: nanu śrutyā kapilasya sarvajñatvoktestanmate śraddhā durvāretyata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:106: atra ca sarvajñānasaṃbhṛtatvena śrutaḥ kapilo vāsudevāṃśa eva /
GSP33brsgor2u:107: sa hi sarvātmatvajñānaṃ vaidikaṃ sāṃkhyamupadiśatīti sarvajña iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:109: kiñca yaḥ kapilaṃ jñānairbibharti tamīśvaraṃ paśyediti vidhīyate,
GSP33brsgor2u:110: tathā cānyārthasya īśvarapratipattiśeṣasya kapilasarvajñatvasya darśanamanuvādastasya mānāntareṇa prāptiśūnyasya svārthasādhakatvāyogānnānuvādamātrātsarvajñātvaprasiddhirityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:112: dvaitavādinaḥ kapilasya śrautatvaṃ nirasya brahmavādino manoḥ śrautatvamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:116: puruṣā ātmānaḥ kiṃ vastuto bhinnā uta sarvadṛśyānāṃ pratyagātmaḥ eka iti vimarśārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:117: bahūnāṃ puruṣākārāṇāṃ dehānāṃ yathaikā yonirupādānaṃ pṛthvī tathā taṃ puruṣamātmānaṃ viśvaṃ sarvopādānatvena sarvātmakaṃ sarvajñātvādiguṇaiḥ saṃpannaṃ kathayiṣyāmi /
GSP33brsgor2u:118: viśve sarve lokaprasiddhā devatiryaṅmanuṣyādīnāṃ mūrdhāno 'syaiveti viśvamūrdhā,
GSP33brsgor2u:130: yasmiñjñānakāle kevalaṃ svatantraprakṛtikalpanayaiva vedaviruddhaṃ na kintvātmabhedakalpanayāpīti siddhamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:131: smṛtivirodhe vedasyaivāprāmāṇyaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:134: pauruṣeyavākyānāṃ svārthasmṛtitanmūlānubhavayoḥ kalpanayā pramāṇyaṃ jñeyamiti vyavahitaṃ parataḥprāmāṇyamiti viprakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:137: iha svataḥparataḥpramāṇyayorvaiṣamyājjhaṭiti niścitaprāmāṇyena cānupasaṃjātavirodhinā vedavākyena viruddhasmṛtereva bādha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:145: ahaṅkāraprakṛtikatvena tanmātrāṇyapyaprasiddhāni smartuṃ na śakyanta ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:151: sāṃkhyasmṛtermahadādiṣviva pradhāne 'pi prāmāṇyaṃ neti niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:152: sāṃkhyasmṛterbādhe 'pi taduktayuktīnāṃ kathaṃ bādha ityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:157: brahmaṇyuktasamanvayaḥ pradhānavādiyogasmṛtyā virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvanyāyamatidiśati-
GSP33brsgor2u:165: na kevalaṃ yoge vidhiḥ kintu yogasya jñāpakānyarthavādavākyānyapi santītyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:167: tāṃ pūrvoktāṃ dhāraṇāṃ yogavido yogaṃ paramaṃ tapa iti manyante /
GSP33brsgor2u:168: uktāmetāṃ brahmavidyāṃ yogividhiṃ dhyānaprakāraṃ ca mṛtyuprasādānnaciketā labdhā brahma prāpta iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:172: evaṃ yogasmṛteryoge prāmāṇyāttattvāṃśe 'pi prāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣamanūdya siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:174: nanu bauddhādismṛtayo 'tra kimiti na nirākṛtā ityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:178: teṣāṃ prakṛtānāṃ kāmānāṃ kāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyayogābhyāṃ vivekadhyānābhyāmabhipannaṃ pratyaktayā prāptaṃ devaṃ jñātvā sarvapāśairavidyādibhirmucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:179: samūlatve smṛtidvayasya nirāsaḥ kimiti kṛta ityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:190: upakārakabādho na yukta ityāśaṅkya yoṃ'śa upakārakaḥ sa na bādhyaḥ kintu tattvāṃśa ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:196: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt / BBs_2,1.4 /
GSP33brsgor2u:197: smṛtīnāmaprāmāṇyāttābhiḥ samanvayasya na virodha iti siddhāntalakṣaṇatvādvṛttānuvādenāsyādhikaraṇasya tātparyamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:211: kiñca brahmasākṣātkārasya mokṣahetutve pradhānasyāntaraṅgaṃ tarkastasyāparokṣadṛṣṭāntagocaratvena pradhānavadaparokṣārthaviṣayatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:223: ghaṭavaditi sāṃkhyayoganyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe smṛtermūlābhāvāddurbalatve 'pyanumānasya vyāptimūlatvena prābalyāttena virudhyata iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:234: yaditthaṃ tattathā yathā mṛdanvitā ghaṭādaya ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:238: yathā hi eka eva strīpiṇḍaḥ patisapatnyupapatīnāṃ prītiparitāpaviṣādādīnkaroti,
GSP33brsgor2u:280: tathā 'vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ ca'iti cetanācetanavibhāgaśabdasyopacaritārthatvaṃ na yuktamiti sāṃkhyaḥ samādhatte-
GSP33brsgor2u:287: ahaṃśreyase svasvaśreṣṭhatvāya prāṇā vivadamānā ityuktaprāṇānāṃ cetanavācidevatāpadena viśeṣitatvāt prāṇādipadairabhimānivyapadeśa ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:288: prāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ viditvā prāṇādhīnā jātā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:312: kiñca yayoḥ prakṛtivikārabhāvastayoḥ sādṛśyaṃ vadatā vaktavyaṃ kimātyantikaṃ yatkiñcidveti /
GSP33brsgor2u:319: jagati samastasya brahmasvabhāvasya cetanatvāderananuvartanānna brahmakāryamiti pakṣe sarvasāmye prakṛtivikāratvamityuktaṃ syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:333: eṣā brahmaṇi matistarkeṇa svatantreṇa nāpaneyā na saṃpādanīyā /
GSP33brsgor2u:335: kutārkikādanyenaiva vedavidācāryeṇa proktā matiḥ sujñānāyānubhavāya phalāya bhavati /
GSP33brsgor2u:336: he preṣṭha, priyatameti naciketasaṃ prati mṛtyorvacanam /
GSP33brsgor2u:337: iyaṃ vividhā sṛṣṭiryataḥ ā samantādbabhūva taṃ ko addhā sākṣādveda /
GSP33brsgor2u:339: ka iha loke taṃ pravocat prāvocat /
GSP33brsgor2u:342: prabhavaṃ janma na viduḥ mama sarvāditvena janmābhāvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:345: śrutyā tattve niścite satyanu paścāt puruṣadoṣasyāsaṃbhāvanādernirāsāya gṛhītaḥ śrutyanugṛhītaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:353: yathā ghaṭādayo mṛdabhinnāstathā jagadbrahmābhinnaṃ tajjatvādityādistarka āśrīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:354: ito 'nyādṛśatarkasyātra brahmaṇyapraveśādasya cānukūlatvānna tarkeṇākṣepāvakāśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:359: yaduktaṃ ekadeśinā sarvasya jagataścetanatvoktau vibhāgaśrutyanupapattiriti dūṣaṇaṃ sāṃkhyena /
GSP33brsgor2u:365: siddhānte cetanācetanavailakṣaṇyāṅgīkāre kathaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvamityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:370: asad iti cen na pratiṣedhamātratvāt / BBs_2,1.7 /
GSP33brsgor2u:372: svaviruddhakāraṇātmanā sattvāyogādityapasiddhāntāpattimāśaṅkya mithyātvātkāryasya kālatraye 'pi kāraṇātmanā sattvamaviruddhamiti samādhatte-
GSP33brsgor2u:384: satkāryavādasiddhyarthaṃ kāryābhede kāraṇasyāpi kāryavadaśuddhyādiprasaṅga iti śaṅkāsūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33brsgor2u:388: yathā jale līyamānaṃ lavaṇadravyaṃ jalaṃ dūṣayati tadvadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:397: yadi layakāle 'pikāryaṃ kāraṇādvibhaktaṃ tarhi sthitikālavallayābhāvaprasaṅgātkāryeṇa dvaitāpatteścāsamañjasamidaṃ darśanamityarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brsgor2u:411: asati kārye taddharmeṇa kāraṇasya yogo na saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsgor2u:413: nanu satkāryavāde laye 'pi kāryasya kāraṇābhedena sattvāddūṣakatvaṃ syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:422: astyeva svapnakāle dṛṣṭaḥ saṃsarga ityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:425: yadyajñasya jīvasyāvasthābhirasaṃsargastadā sarvajñasya kiṃ vācyamiti dārṣṭāntikamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:430: yadā tattvamasītyupadeśakāle prabudhyate māyānidrāṃ tyajati tadā janmalayasthityavasthāśūnyamadvaitamīśvaramātmatvenānubhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:438: iha suṣupteḥ prāk prabodhe yena jātyādinā vibhaktā bhavanti tadā punarutthānakāle tathaiva bhavantīti vibhāgoktiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:439: nanu suṣuptau punarvibhāgaśaktyajñānasattve 'pi sarvapralaye tatsattvaṃ kuta ityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:441: yathā suṣuptau paramātmani sarvakāryāṇāmavibhāge 'pi punarvibhāgahetvajñānaśaktirasti evamapītau mahāpralaye 'pi mithyābhūtājñānasaṃbandhātpunaḥ sṛṣṭivibhāgaśaktiranumāsyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:442: yataḥ sthitāvidānīṃ mithyājñānakāryo vibhāgavyavahārastattvabodhābhāvāt svapnavadabādhito dṛśyate,
GSP33brsgor2u:456: satyakāryasya viruddhakāraṇātmanā sattvāyogāt sāṃkhyasyaivāyaṃ doṣo na kāryamithyātvavādina iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:462: yadi vyavasthārthaṃ muktānāṃ bhedāḥ saṃghātaviśeṣāḥ pradhāne līyante baddhānāṃ bhedāstu na līyanta ityucyate tarhyalīnānāṃ puruṣavatkāryatvavyāghāta ityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brsgor2u:465: tarkāpratiṣṭhānād apy anyathānumeyam iti ced evam apy anirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ / BBs_2,1.11 /
GSP33brsgor2u:466: kiñca tarkasya saṃbhāvitadoṣatvāttena nirdeṣavedāntasamanvayo na bādhya ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:468: puruṣamatīnāṃ vicitratve 'pi kapilasya sarvajñatvāttadīyatarke viśvāsa iti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:470: 'kapilo yadi sarvajñaḥ kaṇādo neti kā pramā'iti nyāyena pariharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:474: vilakṣaṇatvāditarkāṇāmapratiṣṭhitatve 'pi vyāptipakṣadharmatāsaṃpannaḥ kaścittarkaḥ pratiṣṭhito bhaviṣyati tena pradhānamanumeyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:487: kiñca pūrvottaramīmāṃsayostarkeṇaiva vākyatātparyanirṇayasya kriyamāṇatvāttarkaḥ pratiṣṭhita ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:494: sarvatarkāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ pūrvapakṣa eva na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:498: kvacittarkasya pratiṣṭhāyāmapi jagatkāraṇaviśeṣe tarkasya svātantryaṃ nāstīti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33brsgor2u:507: ekarūpavastujñānasya samyagjñānatve 'pi tarkajanyatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:511: ekarūpeṇānavasthito viṣayo yasya tattarkaprabhavaṃ kathaṃ samyagjñānaṃ bhavediti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor2u:516: tasmāt tarkotthajñānānmuktyayogāt tarkeṇa vedāntasamanvayabādho na yuktaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:525: sa kiṃ yadvibhu tanna dravyopādānamiti vaiśeṣikādinyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe
GSP33brsgor2u:530: nanu sāṃkhyamatasyopadeśastārkikamatasyātideśaḥ kimiti kṛto vaiparītyasyāpi saṃbhavādityāśaṅkya pūrvottarādhikaraṇayorupadeśātideśabhāve kāraṇamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:533: pradhānavādaḥ śiṣṭairdebalādibhiḥ satkāryatvāṃśena svīkṛta iti prabalatvādupadeśaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:534: aṇvādivādānāṃ nirmūlatvena durbalatvena durbalatvādatideśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:542: ataḥ samanvayasya tārkikanyāyena na virodha iti siddham //12//
GSP33brsgor2u:545: bhoktrāpatter avibhāgaś cet syāl lokavat / BBs_2,1.13 /
GSP33brsgor2u:547: sa kiṃ yanmitho bhinnaṃ tannādvitīyakāraṇābhinnaṃ yathā mṛttantujau ghaṭapaṭhāviti
GSP33brsgor2u:548: tarkasahitabhedapratyakṣādinā virudhyate na veti saṃdehe brahmaṇi tarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatve
GSP33brsgor2u:556: yastvadvitīyabrahmābhedādbhūjalādīnāmabhedo brahmopādānakatvaśrutiviṣayaḥ sa 'ādityo yūpaḥ'ityarthavādārthavanmānāntarayogya eveti dvaitapramāṇerapahriyata iti samādhatte-
GSP33brsgor2u:561: tarkāderdvaite prāmāṇye 'pi tataḥ samanvayavirodhe kimāyātamiti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:565: tarkādeḥ prāmāṇyāt dvaitabādhakatvaṃ śruterayuktamityadvaitasamanvayabādho yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:584: kathaṃ vā teṣāṃ bhede satyekasmādabhinnatvamityāśaṅkya na hi dṛṣṭenupapattiriti nyāyenāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:594: nanu bhoktuḥ pratidehaṃ vibhāgaḥ kathamityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:610: ekasyāṃ rajjvāṃ daṇḍasragādidvaitadarśanādityayaṃ mukhyaḥ parihāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:616: vāgārabhyaṃ nāmamātraṃ vikāro na kāraṇātpṛthagastītyevakārārtha iti śrutiṃ yojayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:635: kiñca saṃsārasya satyatve tadviśiṣṭasya jīvasya brahmaikyopadeśo na syādvirodhādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:650: yattu pramātṛtvādivyavahāraḥ satya eva mokṣāvasthāyāṃ nivartata iti,
GSP33brsgor2u:653: saṃsārasatyatve tadavasthāyāṃ jīvasya brahmatvaṃ na syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:656: kiñca yathā loke kaścit taskarabuddhyā bhaṭairgṛhīto 'nṛtavādī cettaptaparaśuṃ gṛhṇāti sa dahyate badhyate ca,
GSP33brsgor2u:657: tathā nānātvavādī dahyate satyavādī cenna dahyate mucyate ca /
GSP33brsgor2u:658: tathaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvamityekatvadarśī mucyata iti śrutadṛṣṭāntenaikatvaṃ satyaṃ nānātvaṃ mithyetyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:673: nanu karmakārakāṇāṃ yajamānādīnāṃ vidyākārakāṇāṃ śiṣyādīnāṃ ca kalpitabhedamāśritya karmajñānakāṇḍayoḥ pravṛtteḥ svaprameyasya dharmāderabādhātprāmāṇyamavyāhatamityāśaṅkyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:676: tatra dvaitaviṣaye pratyakṣādīnāṃ yāvadbādhaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyamupapadyata ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:680: vastuto mithyātve 'pi vikāreṣu tanniścayābhāvena pratyakṣādivyavahāropapattāvuktadṛṣṭāntaṃ vivṛṇoti-
GSP33brsgor2u:682: evaṃ dvaitapramāṇānāṃ vyavahārakāle bādhaśūnyārthabodhakatvaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ prāmāṇyamupapādya
GSP33brsgor2u:683: dvaitapramāṇānāṃ vedāntānāṃ sarvakāleṣu bādhaśūnyabrahmabodhakatvaṃ tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyamupapādayitumuktaśaṅkāmanuvadati-
GSP33brsgor2u:691: sarpeṇādaṣṭasyāpi daṣṭatvabhrāntikalpitaviṣātsatyamaraṇamūrcchādidarśanādasatyāt satyaṃ na jāyata ityaniyama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:694: asatyātsarpodarādeḥ satyasya daṃśanasnānādijñānasya kāryasya darśanādvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:699: avagatirvṛttiḥ ghaṭādivatsatyāpi prātibhāsikasvapnadṛṣṭavastunaḥ phalaṃ caitanyaṃ vā vṛttyabhivyaktamavagatiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:702: svapnasthāvagateḥ svapnadehadharmatva utthitasya mayā tādṛśaḥ svapno 'vagata ityabādhitāvagatipratisaṃdhānaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:704: asatyātsatyasya jñānaṃ na jāyata iti dvitīyaniyamasya śrutyā vyabhicāramāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:706: naca striyo mithyātve 'pi taddarśanātsatyādeva satyāyāḥ samṛtdherjñānamiti vācyam,
GSP33brsgor2u:707: viṣayaviśiṣṭatvena darśanasyāpi mithyātvātprakṛte 'pi satye brahmaṇi mithyāvedānugatacaitanyāñjñānasaṃbhavācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:712: rekhāsvakāratvādibhrāntyā satyā akārādayo jñāyanta iti prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:713: evamasatyātsatyasya janmoktyā tadarthakriyākāri tatsatyamiti niyamo bhagnaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:714: anṛtātsatyasya jñānoktyā yadanṛtakaraṇagamyaṃ tadbādhyaṃ kūṭaliṅgānumitavahnivaditi vyāptirbhagnā /
GSP33brsgor2u:715: tathā ca kalpitānāmapi vedāntānāṃ satyabrahmabodhakatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti tāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:718: kiñca yadyubhayorekadā vyavahāraḥ syāt tadā syādapi satyatvam /
GSP33brsgor2u:725: tat kilātmatattvamasya piturvākyāt śvetaketurvijñātavāniti jñānotpatteḥ śrutatvātsāmagrīsattvāccetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:728: kintu tayā virodhādanupajīvyaṃ pratyakṣādestāttvikaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ bādhyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:731: nanu sarvasya dvaitasya mithyātve svapno mithyā jāgrata satyamityādirlaukiko vyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:732: satyaṃ cānṛtaṃ ca satyamabhavaditi vaidikaśca kathamityāśaṅkya yathā svapne idaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:744: sṛṣṭau pariṇāmitvaṃ pralaye tadrāhitya ca krameṇāviruddhamiti dṛṣṭāntena śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:746: kūṭasthasya kadācidapi vikriyā na yuktā kūṭasthatvavyāghātādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:750: kūṭasthasya niravayavasya pūrvarūpatyāgenāvasthāntarātmakapariṇāmāyogācchuktirajatavadvivarta eva prapañca iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:753: 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati'iti śruterbrahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmitvavijñānāttatprāptirviduṣaḥ phalamityāśaṅkyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:761: avidyātmake cidātmani līne nāmarūpe eva bījaṃ tasya vyākaraṇaṃ sthūlātmanā sṛṣṭistadapekṣatvādīśvaratvāderna virodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:769: nāmarūpe cedīśvarasyātmabhūte tarhīśvaro jaḍa ityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:776: na cātra nānājīvā bhāṣyoktā iti bhramitavyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:787: tena svarūpajñānāvaraṇena kartāhamīśvaro me niyantetyevaṃ bhramanti /
GSP33brsgor2u:790: na kevalaṃ laukikavyavahārārthaṃ pariṇāmaprakriyāśrayaṇaṃ kintūpāsanārthaṃ cetyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:798: kāraṇasya bhāve sattve upalabdhau ca kāryasya sattvādupalabdheścānanyatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:801: anyatve 'pyayaṃ hetuḥ kiṃ na syādityaprayojakatvamāśaṅkya nirasyati-
GSP33brsgor2u:805: ato mṛdghaṭayostena hetunā nimittādibhāvaḥ sidhyati nānanyatvamityarthāntaratāmāśaṅkāyaha-
GSP33brsgor2u:813: agnibhāva eva dhūmopalabdhiriti niyamātmako hetustatra nāstītyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:817: tadbhāvaniyatabhāvatve sati tadbuddhyanuraktabuddhiviṣayatvasya hetorvivakṣitatvānna vyabhicāra ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:822: tathā ca tayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorbhāvena sattayānuraktāṃ sahakṛtāmiti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:826: anumānārthatvena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya pāṭhāntareṇa pratyakṣaparatayā vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33brsgor2u:829: na caikaḥ paṭa iti pratyakṣaṃ paṭasya tantubhyaḥ pṛthaksattve pramāṇaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:831: ata ātānavitānasaṃyogavantastantava eva paṭa iti pratyakṣopalabdheḥ sattvādananyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:835: yatra pratyakṣaṃ nāsti tatra kārye vimatakāraṇādabhinnaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:842: brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tātparyasyoktatvāttadevādvitīyaṃ pariśiṣyate na kāraṇāntaramaprāmāṇikatvāditi bhāvaḥ //15//
GSP33brsgor2u:846: idaṃ jagat sadātmaiveti sāmānādhikaraṇyaśrutyā sṛṣṭeḥ prākkāryasya kāraṇātmanā sattvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:851: ghaṭādikaṃ prāg mṛdādyātmanā vartate tata utpadyamānatvāt sāmānyato vyatirekeṇa sikatābhyastailavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:852: kāraṇavatkāryasyāpi sattvāt sattvabhede mānābhāvāt kāryasya kāraṇādabhinnasattākatvamiti sūtrasyārthāntaramāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:856: tadabhedena satī mṛt san ghaṭa iti bhāsamānayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorananyatvamityarthaḥ //16//
GSP33brsgor2u:863: vastutaḥ sarvatra sattaikye 'pi ghaṭapaṭayorabhedena sattāyā bhinnatvānna tādātmyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:867: asadvyapadeśān neti cen na dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣāt / BBs_2,1.17 /
GSP33brsgor2u:868: uktaṃ kāryasya prāk kāraṇātmanā sattvamasiddhamityāśaṅkya samādhatte-
GSP33brsgor2u:870: 'aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhyāt'ityupakrame kenāktā iti saṃdehe 'tejo vai ghṛtam'iti vākyaśeṣāddhṛteneti yathā niścayaḥ evamatrāpi 'tatsat'iti vākyaśeṣātsanniścaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:881: dadhyādyarthināṃ kṣīrādau pravṛttyanyathānupapattiryuktistayā kāryasya prākkāraṇānanyatvena sattvaṃ sidhyatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:882: asato 'pi kāryasya tasmādutpatteḥ kāraṇatvadhiyā tatra pravṛttirityanyathopapattimāśaṅkyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:897: yasya kasyacidanyasya naraśṛṅgasya vā niyāmakatvaprasaṅgādanyatvāsattvayoḥ śaktāvanyatra cāviśeṣāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:900: kiñca kāryakāraṇayoranyatve mṛdghaṭau bhinnau santāviti bhedabuddhiḥ syādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:905: ādye sa saṃbandhaḥ kiṃ samavāyaḥ uta svarūpam /
GSP33brsgor2u:925: kiñca 'niṣpāpatvādayo guṇāḥ'iti śrutismṛtyādiṣu 'vyavahārādiṣṭadharmo guṇaḥ'iti paribhāṣayā samāyasyāpi guṇatvācca /
GSP33brsgor2u:928: ataḥ samavāyasiddheḥ prāk saṃyogasya guṇatvamasiddhamiti dik /
GSP33brsgor2u:929: kiñca pratītyanusāreṇa vastu svīkāryamanyathā gopratiteraśva ālambanamityasyāpi suvacatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:930: tathā ca mṛdghaṭa ityabhedapratīterabheda eva svīkāryaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:937: tatrādyamanūdyavayavinaḥ paṭādestantvādiṣvavayaveṣu tritvādivatsvarūpeṇa vṛttirutāvayavaśa iti vikalpādyaṃ dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:942: yathā haste kośe cāvayavaśaḥ khaṅgo vartamāno hastamātragrahe 'pi gṛhyate,
GSP33brsgor2u:949: yathā yugapadanekavyaktiṣu vṛttāvapi jāteranekatvadoṣo nāsti tathāvayavina ityāśaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:956: yathā devadattaḥ svakāryamadhyayanaṃ grāme 'raṇye vā karoti,
GSP33brsgor2u:957: yathā gauravayavī svakāryaṃ kṣīrādikaṃ śṛṅgapucchādāvapi kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:961: yathā ghaṭaścalatītyukte calanakriyāṃ pratyāśrayatvarūpaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ghaṭasya bhāti tathā paṭo jāyata iti janikriyākartṛtvamanubhūyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:974: saṃprati kāryasyotpattirnāma svakāraṇe samavāyaḥsvasmin sattāsamavāyo veti tārkikamatamāśaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:980: nanu naraśṛṅgādivatkāryaṃ sarvadā sarvatrāsanna bhavati kintūtpatteḥ prāk dhvaṃsānantaraṃ cāsat madhye tu sadeveti vaiṣamyātsaṃbandhitvopapattirityāśaṅkyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:984: nanu kārakavyāpārādūrdhvabhāvinaḥ kāryasya vandhyāputratulyatvaṃ kathamityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:996: kāryasatyatvamicchatāṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ satkāryavāde kārakavaiyarthyaṃ doṣa āpatati,
GSP33brsgor2u:1001: nanu kāraṇādbhinnamasadevotpadyata iti samādhānaṃ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkyāsatpakṣasya dūṣaṇamuktaṃ smaretyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1003: ataḥ kāraṇādbhedābhedābhyāṃ durnirūpasya sadasadvilakṣaṇasyānirvācyābhivyaktiranirvācyakārakavyāpārāṇāṃ phalamiti pakṣa eva śreyāniti bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1013: dārṣṭāntike tu mṛdādināśe sati ghaṭādikaṃ jāyata iti janmavināśarūpaviruddhadharmavattvātkāryakāraṇayorabhedo na yukta iti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:1018: nanu yatrānvayo dṛśyate tatra hetvasiddhāvapi yatrāṅkurādau vaṭabījādīnāmanvayo na dṛśyate tatra hetusattvādvasatvanyatvaṃ syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1020: tatrāpyaṅkurādau bījādyavayavānāmanvayānna sta eva janmavināśau kintvavayāntaropacayāpacayābhyāṃ tadvyavahāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1021: astūpacayāpacayaliṅgena vastubhedānumānaṃ tato 'sata utpattiḥ sato nāśa ityāśaṅkya vyabhicāramāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1044: kāryamupādānadbhinnaṃ tadupalabdhāvapyanupalabhyamānatvāt tato 'dhikaparimāṇatvācca maśakādiva śaśaka ityatra vyabhicārārthaṃ sūtram-
GSP33brsgor2u:1062: sa yadi tādṛgbrahmajagajjanayettarhi svāniṣṭaṃ narakādikaṃ na janayet svatantracetanatvāditi
GSP33brsgor2u:1063: nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvoktajīvānanyatvamupajīvya jīvadoṣā brahmaṇi
GSP33brsgor2u:1074: jīveśayorabhedājjīvajagaterdeṣā brahmaṇi syuḥ brahmagatāśca sṛṣṭisaṃhāraśaktisarvasmartṛtvādayo guṇā jīve syuḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1076: jīvasya svaśarīre 'pi saṃhārasāmarthyādarśanāditi prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33brsgor2u:1079: yadi vayaṃ jīvaṃ sraṣṭāraṃ brūmastadā doṣāḥ prasajyante natu taṃ brūma ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1080: kiñcābhedājñānādūrdhvaṃ vā doṣā āpādyante, pūrvaṃ vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1089: jñānādūrdhvaṃ sraṣṭṛtvādidharmāṇāṃ bādhāt pūrvaṃ ca kalpitabhedena vyavasthopapatterna kiñcidavadyamityarthaḥ //22//
GSP33brsgor2u:1094: kathaṃ ca tatkāryavaicitryamityanupapattiṃ dṛṣṭāntaiḥ pariharati sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33brsgor2u:1103: kiñca kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādivikārasya mithyātvājjīvasyaiva tāvaddoṣo nāsti kuto bimbasthānīyasyāśeṣaviśeṣadarśinaḥ parameśvarasya doṣaprasaktiḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1109: tasmāt pratyagabhinne brahmaṇi samanvayasyāvirodha iti siddham //23//
GSP33brsgor2u:1112: upasaṃhāradarśanān neti cen na kṣīravad dhi / BBs_2,1.24 /
GSP33brsgor2u:1115: sa kiṃ yadasahāyaṃ tanna kāraṇamiti laukikanyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe pūrvamaupādhikajīvabhedādbrahmaṇi jīvadoṣā na prasajyanta ityuktam,
GSP33brsgor2u:1116: saṃprati upādhito 'pi vibhaktaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prerakādikaṃ sahakāri nāsti īśanānātvābhāvāditi pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣasūtrāṃśaṃ vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33brsgor2u:1123: viśiṣṭasyeśvarasya tu māyaiva sahāya iti bhāvenāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1125: kṣīrasyāpyātañcanādisahāyo 'stītyasahāyatvahetorna vyabhicāra ityāśaṅkya sahāyābhāve 'pi yasya kasyacitpariṇāmasya kṣīre darśanādvyabhicāratādavasthyamityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1129: nanu tvāryate kṣīraṃ dadhibhāvāya śaighryaṃ kāryata iti kimarthaṃ kalpyate,
GSP33brsgor2u:1130: svato 'śaktaṃ kṣīraṃ sahāyena śaktaṃ kriyata iti kiṃ na syāt, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1136: tarhi śaktivyañjako 'pi sahāyo brahmaṇo vācyaḥ, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1144: nanu brahma na kāraṇaṃ cetanatve satyasahāyatvānmṛdādiśūnyakulālādivaditi na kṣīrādau vyabhicāra iti sūtravyāvartyāṃ śaṅkāmāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1157: atra hi hetau cetanatvamahandhīviṣayatvarūpaṃ cittādātmyāpannadehasādhāraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ na tu mukhyātmatvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:1162: tathā ca kulālavailakṣaṇyaṃ devādīnāṃ ghaṭādikārye svātiriktānapekṣatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1165: śrūyate hi mahābhārate śrīkṛṣṇasya saṃkalpamātreṇa draupadyāḥ paṭaparamparotpattiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1171: kṣīradṛṣṭāntena brahma pariṇāmīti bhramotpattyā pūrvapakṣe prāpte śāstrārtho vivarto
GSP33brsgor2u:1176: sa kiṃ yanniravayavaṃ tanna pariṇāmīti nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe virudhyata iti pūrvapakṣasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33brsgor2u:1178: brahma pariṇāmīti vadatā vaktavyaṃ brahma niravayavaṃ sāvayavaṃ vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1179: ādye sarvasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmātmanā sthitiḥ syādityuktaṃ vyatirekadṛṣṭāntena vivṛṇoti-
GSP33brsgor2u:1185: yadā pariṇāmavyatirekeṇa mūlabrahmātmā nāsti tadātmā draṣṭavya ityupadeśor'thaśūnyaḥ syāditi doṣāntaramāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1194: pariṇāmapakṣo durghaṭa iti yaduktaṃ tadasmādiṣṭameveti vivartavādena siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:1204: 'sa vā eṣa ātmā hṛdi'iti śruterasti dṛśyātiriktaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsgor2u:1214: ato yaddvidhābhūtaṃ tatsāvayamiti tarkaviruddhaṃ brahmaṇo niravayavatvamiti vivartamajānataḥ śaṅkāṃ gūḍhāśaya eva pariharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:1216: yadā laukikānāṃ pratyakṣadṛṣṭānāmapi śaktiracintyā tadā śabdaikasamadhigamyasya brahmaṇaḥ kimu vaktavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1219: prakṛtibhyaḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭavastusvabhāvebhyo yatparaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ kevalopadeśagamyaṃ tadacintyasvarūpamiti smṛtyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1222: yadvā brahma pariṇāmītyekadeśināmiyaṃ siddhāntasūtravyākhyā darśitā tāmākṣipati-
GSP33brsgor2u:1225: nanu brahma sāvayavaṃ niravayavaṃ veti vikalpāśrayaṇe sarvaśrutisamādhānaṃ syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1230: ataḥ prakārāntarānupalambhācchrutīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ durghaṭamiti prāpte svāśayamuddhāṭayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:1238: nanu śrutipratipādyasya pariṇāmasya kathaṃ mithyātmatvaṃ, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1245: ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāś ca hi / BBs_2,1.28 /
GSP33brsgor2u:1250: tatra brahmaṇo vivartopādānatvaṃ svapnasākṣidṛṣṭāntena draḍhayanmāyāvādaṃ sphuṭayati sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33brsgor2u:1259: pradhānasya niravayavatve kṛtsnaprasaktiḥ sāvayavatve ca niravayavatvābhyupagamavirodha ityatra śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:1267: atha niravayavā guṇā eva vividhapariṇāmānāṃ prakṛtiriti cet,
GSP33brsgor2u:1271: pratyekaṃ sattvādikamitaraguṇadvayasacivaṃ niravayavaṃ yadyupādānaṃ tarhi kṛtsnasyopādānasya
GSP33brsgor2u:1277: nanu guṇānāmavayavāstantuvadārambhakā na bhavanti kintu kāryavaicitryānumitāstadgatāḥ śaktaya ityāśaṅkya māyikaśaktibhirbrahmaṇo 'pi sāvayavatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1284: na hyaṇoraṇvantareṇoparyadhaḥ pārśvataśca vyāptau tato 'dhikadravyaṃ saṃbhavatiḥ dvitīye paramāṇvoḥ sāvayavatvāpattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1285: nanu tvaṃ cora ityukte tvamapi cora itivaddoṣasāmyoktirayuktetyata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1288: ato niravayave brahmaṇi samanvayasyāvirodha iti siddham //29//
GSP33brsgor2u:1293: māyāśaktimato brahmaṇo jagatsargaṃ vadataḥ samanvayasyāśarīrasya na māyeti nyāyena
GSP33brsgor2u:1294: virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe nyāyasyānābhāsatvādastīti pūrvapakṣe pūrvoktaśaktimattvasamarthanādekaviṣayatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1303: vikaraṇatvān neti cet tad uktam / BBs_2,1.31 /

GSP33brsgor2u:1386: nanu tarhi dharmādharmābhyāmeva vicitrā sṛṣṭirastu kimīśvareṇetyata āha-

GSP33brsgor2u:1391: naca kañcijjanaṃ sādhu kañcidasādhu karma kārayato vaiṣamyaṃ tadavasthamiti vācyaṃ,

GSP33brsgor2u:1396: na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvād / BBs_2,1.35 /
GSP33brsgor2u:1403: ādāvekarūpatve madhye viṣamakarmotpattau hetvabhāvenottarasṛṣṭīnāmapi tulyatvasya durvāratvāditi draṣṭavyam /

GSP33brsgor2u:1429: asya saṃsāravṛkṣasya svarūpaṃ satyaṃ mithyā vetyupadeśaṃ vinā nopalabhyate /

GSP33brsgor2u:1448: yadyapi sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca loke kāraṇadharmatvenāprasiddhaṃ tathāpi yo yasya kartā sa tasya sarvasya jñātā śaktaśceti prasiddham,
GSP33brsgor2u:1455: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyasyādhyāyasya prathamapādaḥ samāptaḥ //1//

GSP33brsgor2u:1459: yasya tattvaṃ na jānanti taṃ vande raghupuṅgavam //1//
GSP33brsgor2u:1464: nanu mumukṣūṇāṃ vākyārthanirṇayapratibandhanirāsāya vedāntānāṃ tātparyaṃ niścetumidaṃ śāstramārabdhaṃ tacca nirdeṣatayā niścitaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:1465: tataḥ parapakṣanirāsātmako 'yaṃ pādo 'smin śāstre na saṃgataḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:1473: nanu rāgadveṣakaraṇatvāt paramatanirākaraṇaṃ na kāryamiti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:1477: sā ca teṣu bhrāntimūlatvaniścayaṃ vinā na sidhyati,

GSP33brsgor2u:1482: mandamatīnām teṣu śraddhānimittāni bahūni santīti tannirāsāya yatnaḥ kriyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1485: parapakṣatvabuddhyā hi nirāso dveṣamāvahati na tu tattavanirṇayecchayā kṛta iti mantavyam /

GSP33brsgor2u:1491: pradhānamacetanaṃ jagadupādānamiti sāṃkhyasiddhānto 'tra viṣayaḥ sa kiṃ pramāṇamūlo
GSP33brsgor2u:1501: ye vikārā yenānvitāste tatprakṛtikā iti vyāptimāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1510: tadarthaṃ svabhāvata eva pravartate na tu kenaciccetanena preryata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1523: tathā ghaṭādīnāṃ kāraṇaśaktitaḥ pravṛttermahadādikāryāṇāmapi kāraṇaśaktitaḥ pravṛttirvācyā,
GSP33brsgor2u:1525: kiñca kāraṇātkāryasya vibhāgo janma dṛśyate kṣitermṛttikā jāyate tato ghaṭa iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:1526: evamavibhāgaḥ prātilomyena pralayo dṛśyate ghaṭasya mṛttikāyāṃ layaḥ tasyāḥ kṣitau kṣiterapsu apāṃ tejasīti /
GSP33brsgor2u:1527: etau vibhāgāvibhāgau vaiśvarūpyasya vicitrasya bhāvajātasya dṛśyamānau pṛthakpakṣīkṛtau kvacitkāraṇe viśrāntau vibhāgatvādavibhāgatvācca mṛdi ghaṭavibhāgāvibhāgavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1536: svatantramacetanaṃ prakṛtirityetaddṛṣṭāntabalena tadā nirūpyeta yadi dṛṣṭāntaḥ kvacitsyāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:1540: parakīyasya sādhyasyāprasiddhimuktvā satpratipakṣaṃ vaktuṃ yadvicitraracanātmakaṃ kāryaṃ taccetanādhiṣṭhitācetanaprakṛtikamiti vyāptimāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1545: vipakṣe vicitraracanānupapattirūpaṃ sūtroktaṃ bādhakatarkaṃ vaktuṃ jagato vaicitryamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1550: itthaṃ vicitraṃ jagaccetanānadhiṣṭhitā jaḍaprakṛtiḥ kathaṃ racayet /
GSP33brsgor2u:1563: tathā ca pariṇāmitve 'pi mūlaprakṛteracetanatvadharmeṇaiva yogo na cetanādhiṣṭitatvenetyāśaṅkya niṣedhati-
GSP33brsgor2u:1565: mahānasadṛṣṭānte 'ntaraṅgasyāpi mahānasasvarūpasya dhūmavyāpakatvaṃ nāsti tadbhinnasya bahiraṅgasyāpi vahnestadastītyantaraṅgatvaṃ vyāpakatve prayojakaṃ na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1566: kiñca yadacetanaṃ taccetanādhiṣṭhitameva pariṇamata ityaṅgīkāre bādhakābhāvāt pratyuta śrutyanugrahācca tathāṅgīkāryamityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1575: kiñca yadi ghaṭe mṛdvatsukhādikaṃ śabdādyanvitaṃ syāt tarhi sarvairaviśeṣeṇa sukhādikamupalabhyeta ghaṭe mṛdvat /
GSP33brsgor2u:1578: viṣayasyaikatve 'pi puruṣavāsanāvaicitryāt kasyacitsukhabuddhiḥ kasyacidduḥkhabuddhiḥ kasyacinmohabuddhirdṛśyate 'to viṣayāḥ sukhādyātmakā na bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1579: evaṃ samanvayāditi hetuṃ dūṣayitvā parimāṇādihetūn dūṣayati-

GSP33brsgor2u:1590: sattvādīnāṃ parasparaṃ bhinnatve satyapi sādhyābhāvena vyabhicārādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1595: naca yaḥ kāryasya vibhāgaḥ sa cetanānadhiṣṭhitācetane samāpta iti vyāptirasti,
GSP33brsgor2u:1604: evaṃ cetanādhīnakāraṇaśaktitaḥ kāryapravṛttisaṃbhavāt śaktitaḥ pravṛttiliṅgamanyathāsiddhamiti bhāvaḥ //1//
GSP33brsgor2u:1614: tadā na kiñcit kāryaṃ bhavati pralayābhāvaprasaṅgāt /

GSP33brsgor2u:1624: kecittu bhedānāṃ pravṛttiśaktimatvāccetanānadhiṣṭhatācetanaprakṛtikatvamiti śaktitaḥ pravṛttiriti liṅgaṃ vyācakṣate /
GSP33brsgor2u:1627: pravṛttiśaktimatve sati kāryatvasya ghaṭādiṣu cetanādhiṣṭitaprakṛtikatvenoktasādhyaviruddhena vyāptidarśanāditi 'pravṛtteśca'iti sūtreṇa jñāpitam
GSP33brsgor2u:1628: nanu loke svatantrācetanānāṃ pravṛtyadarśane 'pi pradhāne sā pravṛttiḥ sidhyatu, tatrāha-

GSP33brsgor2u:1647: yasminnacetane rathādau pravṛttirdṛṣṭā tasyaiva sā na cetanastatra heturiti kiṃ sāṃkhyamataṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1648: sādhu uta yena cetanenāśvādinā pravṛttistatprayuktā seti vedāntimataṃ vā sādhviti praśnārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1656: jīvaddehasya rathādibhyo vailakṣaṇyaṃ prāṇādisatvaṃ liṅgaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā cetanasya siddhirityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1663: anumitasya sadbhāvamātreṇa pravṛttihetutve sarvatrākāśasyāpi hetutvaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1672: rathādipravṛttāvaśvādicetanasyānvayavyatireko sphuṭau tābhyāṃ cetanasya pravartakatvaṃ bāhyānāmapi saṃmatamityāha-

GSP33brsgor2u:1708: karmaṇo 'pi pradhānātmakasyācetanatvāt sadāsatvācca na kādācitkapravṛttiniyāmakatvamiti bhāvaḥ //4//
GSP33brsgor2u:1712: punarapi dṛṣṭāntabalāt pradhānasya svata eva kādācitkapravṛttirityāśaṅkya niṣedhati sūtrakāraḥ-

GSP33brsgor2u:1745: autsukyamicchāviśeṣaḥ kevalajaḍasyātmano vā na yukta ityarthaḥ /

GSP33brsgor2u:1758: puruṣasya parispandaḥ prayatnaguṇo vā nāstīti vaktuṃ hetudvayam /

GSP33brsgor2u:1784: cirakālasthitasya sāmyasya cyutau nimittaṃ vācyaṃ tannāstītyarthaḥ //8//
GSP33brsgor2u:1791: anapekṣasvabhāvādanyathā sāpekṣatvena guṇānāmanumānātpūrvasūtrokto doṣo na prasajyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:1812: tasmādbhrāntimūlatvātsāṃkhyaśāstrasya tena nirdeṣavedāntasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham /
