GSP33brsgor2u:1846: tayā tapyayā buddhyā puruṣasya saṃyogaḥ svasvāmibhāvastasya heturanādiravivekastasya parihāro vivekastasmānnityamuktasyāpi puruṣasya kathañcidupacārānmokṣopapattirityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:1847: yathā yoddhṛgatau jayaparājayau rājanyupacaryete tathā puruṣādatyantabhinnabuddhigatau bandhamokṣau puruṣe upacaryete /
GSP33brsgor2u:1860: yatra tapyatāpakabhāvo dṛṣṭastatraiveti vyavahārapakṣamādāya siddhāntī brūte-kiṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:1865: acetanasyaiva dehasya taptirneti vadatā sāṃkhyena vaktavyaṃ kiṃ cetanasya kevalasya taptiḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:1880: tarhi jalacandrasya calanavanmithyaiva taptirityasmatpakṣa āgata ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1882: ivaśabdamātreṇa kathaṃ mithyā taptyavagama iti cettaducyate-ivaśabdastapyabuddhisattvasādṛśyaṃ brūte,
GSP33brsgor2u:1883: tacca sādṛśyaṃ puruṣasya tapyatvarūpaṃ cet kalpitameva vastutastaptyabhāvādityupapādayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:1888: saviṣayatvaṃ nirviṣayatvaṃ cevaśabdārthaḥ kalpita eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1889: sāṃkhyasyāvidyake tapyatāpakatve sati mamāpi kiñcinna duṣyati kintu dṛṣṭameva saṃpannamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1890: yadi mithyātapyatvāṅgīkāre 'pasiddhāntaḥ syāditi bhītyā satyaṃ tapyatvaṃ puruṣasyocyate tathāpyapasiddhāntaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:1901: nimittamavivekātmakadarśanaṃ tamastena sahitaḥ sanimittaḥ saṃyegaḥ puruṣasya guṇasvāmitvarūpastadapekṣatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1903: nimittasya nivṛttyabhāvānna mokṣa iti siddhāntī pariharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:1911: vyavahārastu bhedāṅgīkārāttapyatāpakabhāvo bandhaḥ tattvajñānāttannivṛttiścopapadyata iti na codyāvasara ityarthaḥ //10//
GSP33brsgor2u:1917: yadyapi sāṃkhyamatanirāsānantaraṃ paramāṇuvādo nirākartavyaḥ svamatasthāpanasya smṛtipāde
GSP33brsgor2u:1919: tathā brahmaguṇacaitanyānanvayādbrahmaṇo 'pi nopādānatvamiti doṣo dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatilābhādatra samādhīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1921: sa kiṃ yaḥ samavāyikāraṇaguṇaḥ sa kāryadravye svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakastantuśauklyavaditi
GSP33brsgor2u:1922: nyāyena virudhyate na veti saṃdehe nyāyasyāvyabhicārādvirudhyata iti prāpte vyabhicārānna
GSP33brsgor2u:1925: yadyapi 'na vilakṣaṇatvāt'ityatra cetanādacetanasargaḥ sādhitastathāpi vaiśeṣikanyāyasya tadīyaprakriyayā vyabhicāroktyarthatvādasya sūtrasya na gatārthatā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1926: pralayakāle paramāṇavo niścalā asaṃyuktāstiṣṭhanti sargakāle cādṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyogātteṣu karma bhavati,
GSP33brsgor2u:1928: kāraṇaguṇāḥ kārye guṇāntaramānabhanta iti sāmānyena prakriyāmuktvā viśeṣatastāmāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1932: tacca svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhakaṃ na bhavatītyuktanyāyasya vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1937: yathāśrute tu dvābhyāṃ dvyaṇukābhyāṃ mahataścaturaṇukasyārambho na yujyate,
GSP33brsgor2u:1938: kāraṇagataṃ mahatvaṃ bahutvaṃ vā vinā kārye mahatvāyogāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:1939: prakaṭārthakārāstu yaddvābhyāṃ dvyaṇukābhyāmārabdhaṃ kārye mahatvaṃ dṛśyate tasya
GSP33brsgor2u:1940: hetuḥ pracayo nāma praśithilāvayavasaṃyoga iti rāvaṇapraṇīte bhāṣye dṛśyata iti cirantanavaiśeṣikadṛṣṭyedaṃ bhāṣyamityāhuḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1942: yadyapi tārkikā dvābhyāmeva paramāṇubhyāṃ dvyaṇukaṃ tribhirdvyaṇukaistryaṇukamiti kalpayanti tathāpi tarkasyāpratiṣṭhānānna niyama iti matvā
GSP33brsgor2u:1945: kāryadravyaparimāṇaṃ tu na kāraṇaparimāṇārabhyaṃ kintu kāraṇagatasaṃkhyārabhyamiti prakriyā tulyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1946: evaṃ prakriyāṃ darśayayitvā sūtraṃ yojayan vyabhicāramāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1951: aṇuhrasvebhyo dvyaṇukebhyo 'ṇudravyaṃ na jāyate hrasvamapi na jāyata iti vyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1953: tathā ca hrasvaparimaṇḍalābhyāṃ dvyaṇukaparamāṇubhyāṃ mahaddīrghāṇuvaccetanādacetanaṃ jāyata iti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsgor2u:1954: tatra hrasvānmahaddīrghaṃ tryaṇukaṃ parimaṇḍalādaṇu dvyaṇukamiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1964: tadutpatteḥ prāgvirodhyabhāvāt dvyaṇuke pārimāṇḍalyārambhaḥ kiṃ na syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:1965: nanu virodhiparimāṇena sahaiva dravyaṃ jāyata ityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1976: kāraṇānāṃ dvyaṇukānāṃ bahutvāt tryaṇuke mahatvaṃ mṛdo mahatvāt ghaṭe mahatvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:1987: teṣāmanārambhakatve kāryadravyasya virodhiguṇākrāntatvaṃ vyagratvamasaṃnidhirvā na heturityuktiphalamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:1989: yattu kāraṇaguṇaḥ svasamānaguṇārambhaka iti vyāpteḥ sāmānyaguṇeṣu pārimāṇḍalyādiṣu
GSP33brsgor2u:1990: vyabhicāre 'pi yo dravyasamavāyikāraṇagato viśeṣaguṇaḥ sa svasamānajātīyaguṇārambhaka
GSP33brsgor2u:2001: guṇāt dravyavaccetanādacetanārambha iti vilakṣaṇārambhakatvāṃśe 'yaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti pariharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2017: nāsya prāsaṅgikena pūrvādhikaraṇena saṃgatirapekṣiteti manvānaḥ pradhānasyeśvarānadhiṣṭhitasyākāraṇatve
GSP33brsgor2u:2022: sa kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo veti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2024: taiḥ paṭādibhiḥ sāmānyaṃ kṣityādeḥ kāryardravyatvaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2031: vimataṃ sāvayavatvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ yato nivartate sa nyūnaparimāṇasyāpakarṣasya paryantatvenāvasānabhūmitvenāvagataḥ paramāṇurityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2048: evaṃ kāṇādamatasya mānamūlatvāttena vedāntasamanvayasya virodhādasiddhiriti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2051: pralaye vibhaktānāṃ paramāṇūnāmanyatarakarmaṇo 'bhayakarmaṇā vā saṃyogo vācyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2060: sthirasya vegavaddravyasaṃyogāviśeṣo 'bhighātaḥ sa eva calasya nodanamiti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2065: jaḍātmavadaṇorāśrayatvaṃ ki na syāditi matvā vikalpaḥ kṛta iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2077: vibhusaṃyogasyāṇuṣu sadā sattvāt kriyāsātatye pralayābhāvaḥ syāditi dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2081: yajjñānaṃ taccharīrajanyamiti vyāptivirodhena nityajñānāsiddhestadguṇa īśvaro nāsti,
GSP33brsgor2u:2087: saṃyogasya vyāpyavṛttitve ekasminnitarasyāntarbhāvātkāryasya pṛthutvāyogāt sarvaṃ kāryaṃ paramāṇumātraṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2088: kiñca sāṃśadravye saṃyogasyaikāṃśavṛttitvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadvirodhādvyāpyavṛttitvaṃ na kalpyamityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2093: kāṇādānāṃ sargapratyuktau sūtraṃ yojayitvā pralayanirāse 'pi sūtraṃ yojayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2100: tathā ca dṛṣṭādṛṣṭanimittayorasattvādubhayathāpi saṃyogārthatvena vibhāgārthatvena ca karma nāsti,
GSP33brsgor2u:2101: ataḥ karmābhāvāttayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgapūrvakayoḥ sargapralayayorabhāva iti sūtrayojanā //12//
GSP33brsgor2u:2106: aṇuvādāsaṃbhava iti yogyatayā saṃbadhyate dvyaṇukasamavāyayoḥ paramāṇubhinnatvasāmyāt dvyaṇukavatsamavāyasyāpi samavāyāntaramityanavasthitirityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2107: nanviha tantuṣu paṭa ityādiviśiṣṭadhīniyāmakaḥ samavāyo na saṃbandhāntaramapekṣate,
GSP33brsgor2u:2110: saṃyogasyāpi svarūpasaṃbandhopapatteḥ samavāyo na syāditi dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2114: guṇatvābhāve 'pi karmasāmānyādīnāṃ samavāyāṅgīkārādguṇatvaṃ samavāyitve na vyāpakam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2127: nimittaṃ ca kālādṛṣṭādikaṃ nityasaṃnihitamiti nityameva pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2132: kiṃ ca paramāṇavaḥ samavāyikāraṇavantaḥ kāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlā anityāśca,
GSP33brsgor2u:2133: rūpavattvāt rasavattvādgandhavattvāt sparśavattvāt ghaṭavaditi sūtraṃ yojayituṃ paraprakriyāmāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2135: nanvatra paramāṇutvaṃ pakṣatāvacchedakaṃ tadviruddhaṃ sthūlatvaṃ kathaṃ sādhyata iti cet / na /
GSP33brsgor2u:2139: naca tarhi vāyuḥ kāraṇavāniti pṛthaksādhane rūpādihetūnāṃ bhāgāsiddhyabhāve 'pi siddhasādhanatā syāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2141: yatra rūpaṃ tatsakāraṇamiti vyāptigrahakāle vāyutvādyavacchedena sādhyasiddhyabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2149: ghaṭābhāvāvaditi nityasya kvacitsiddhau kāryamanityamiti viśeṣataḥ kārye nityatvapratiṣedhāt kāraṇabhūtaparamāṇuṣu nityatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33brsgor2u:2154: kāraṇanityatvasya pramāṇāntareṇa jñānaṃ vinā kāryamanityamiti vyavahārayogādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2156: yadi pramāṇāntaraṃ kāraṇanityatve syāttadāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ samūlo bhavati,
GSP33brsgor2u:2158: vaṭe yakṣavyavahārādapi tatsiddhiprasaṅgāt mūlajñāne tu tenaiva aśeṣasiddhervyavahāropanyāsavaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2159: evaṃ paramāṇunityatve kāṇādasūtradvayaṃ nirasya tṛtīyaṃ nirasyati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2161: satāmaṇūnāṃ dṛśyamānasathūlakāryāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa kāraṇajñānamavidyeti yadi sūtrārthaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2175: avayavānāṃ saṃyogena dravyāntarotpattirāraṃbha iti yadi mataṃ syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:2178: ataḥ kāraṇameva svato nirviśeṣaṃ viśeṣavadavasthātmanā kāryamityanubhavabalādāstheyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2179: tathā cāṇūnāmapyavidyāpariṇāmarūpāṇāṃ pralayanimittena kālādinā piṇḍātmakasvarūpatirobhāvena kāraṇabhāvāpattirvināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:2184: vastutastu ghṛtaṃ kaṭhinaṃ dravamityanusyūtaghṛtapariṇāmaviśeṣo dravyameva kāṭhinyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:2185: naca dravyatve 'pyavayavavibhāgādeva tasya nāśa iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2188: kiñca pralaye nāsīdrajo nānyat kiñcanetyaṇūnāṃ nāśasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2196: pārthivaḥ paramāṇūradhikaguṇastata ekaikanyūnaguṇā jalādiparamāṇava iti kalpyate, na vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2206: neti pakṣe sarveṣāmāṇūnāṃ sāmyārthamekaikaguṇavattvaṃ vā syāccaturguṇavatvaṃ vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2224: nityaḥ saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti bhinnāni lakṣaṇāni /
GSP33brsgor2u:2238: abhede dravyaṃ guṇa iti śabdapratyayabhedaḥ kathaṃ, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2242: astu guṇādīnāṃ dravyatādātmyamiti vadantaṃ tārkikamanyaṃ pratyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2249: tathāpi tatkāryatvaṃ tadadhīnatvaṃ matvā vyabhicāraṃ śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:2253: tathāpi tādātmyena pratīyamānatvasya hetorvivakṣitatvānna vyabhicāra ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2259: śauklyasya paṭaniṣṭhatvāt paṭasya tantudeśatvāt paṭaśauklyayorapṛthagdeśatvābhāvācchuklaḥ paṭa iti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītirna syādityādyaṃ dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2268: evaṃ ṣaṭpadārthā atyantabhinnā iti siddhānto 'nubhavavirodhena dūṣitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2276: kāraṇasya pṛthaksiddhatve 'kāryamapṛthaksiddhamityuktamupetya saṃbandho 'siddhasya siddhasya veti vikalpyādyaṃ dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:2278: satoraprāptayoḥ prāptiḥ saṃyoga ityabhyupagamāttantupaṭayorapi saṃyogāpattirityapasiddhāntaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2281: kiñca saṃbandhasyāpi saṃbandhe 'navasthānādasaṃbaddhasyāniyāmakatvāt saṃbandho 'pi durnirūpa ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2288: vastubhedasādhane tu vyabhicāra iti samādhatte- na /
GSP33brsgor2u:2294: vilakṣaṇaśabdadhīgamyatvādityupalabdhighaṭitena-lakṣaṇena siṅgena prāptasya vastvantarasya saṃyogādeḥ saṃbandhivyatirekeṇānupalabdherabhāvo niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2297: saṃbandhasya saṃbandhyabhede saṃbandhinaḥ sadā sattvātsarvadā saṃbandhabuddhiprasaṅga iti śaṅkāṃ niṣedhati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2299: parāpekṣayā nairantaryāvasthāyāmaṅgulyoḥ rūparūpiṇośca saṃbandhidhīḥ na svata ityuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2301: saṃpratyadṛṣṭavadātmanāṇūnāṃ saṃyogo 'ṇuṣu kriyāhetuḥ ātmamanoḥ saṃyogo buddhyādyasamavāyikāraṇaṃ nirasyate-
GSP33brsgor2u:2337: 'vayavāstvayocyante ta eva mama paramāṇavaste 'pi sāvayavāścet tadavayavā eveti evaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2338: yataḥ paraṃ na vibhāgaḥ sa eva niravayavaḥ paramāṇuriti śaṅkati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2343: ayamarthaḥ-yatsavātmanāvibhāgāyogyaṃ vastu sa paramāṇuriti yadyucyeta tarhi brahmaṇa eva paramāṇusaṃjñā kṛtā syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:2345: yadi pṛthivyādijātīyo 'lpaparimāṇaviśrāntibhūmiryaḥ sa paramāṇurityucyeta tarhi tasya na mūlakāraṇatvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2351: saṃprati niravayavadravyasya nāśahetvabhāvādātmavadavināśa ityāśaṅkya pūrvoktaṃ parihāraṃ smārayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2372: naca ta eva truṭināmāno jagaddhateva iti vācyam,
GSP33brsgor2u:2386: parimāṇabhedena dehāderāśutaravināśāṅgīkārādardhavaināśiko vaiśeṣikastasya nirāsānantaraṃ sarvakṣaṇikavādī buddhistho nirasyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2388: 'nābhāva upalabdheḥ'iti nirasanīyasiddhāntādatra nirasyasiddhāntasya bhedaṃ vaktuṃ tatsiddhāntaṃ vibhajate-
GSP33brsgor2u:2396: sautrāntiko vaibhāṣiko yogācārī mādhyamikaśceti catvāraḥ śiṣyāḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2401: tatra saṃdihyate kiṃ mānamūlo bhrāntimūlo vāyaṃ siddhānta iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2402: tatra pramāṇamūla iti pūrvapakṣayan siddhāntaṃ tadīyaṃ darśayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2404: sthiraḥ prapañco brahmahetuka iti vedāntasiddhāntasya mānamūlakṣaṇikasiddhāntavirodhādasiddhiḥ pūrvapakṣe phalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2406: pṛthivyādibhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ viṣayendriyātmakaṃ bhautikaṃ ca paramāṇusamudāya eva nāvayavyantaramiti matvā paramāṇūn vibhajate-
GSP33brsgor2u:2425: yathā vidyuditi teṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvamiti mānamūlo 'yaṃ siddhānta iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ yojayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2427: sargādau paramāṇūnāṃ ca skandhānāṃ ca svataḥsaṃghātastāvanna saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsgor2u:2430: saṃghāte dehākāre jāte vijñānaṃ vijñāne jāte saṃghāta ityanyonyāśrayāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:2431: naca kṣaṇikavijñānādanyaḥ kaścijjīva īśvaro vā tvayābhyupagamyate yaḥ saṃghātakartā bhavet /
GSP33brsgor2u:2432: naca kartāramanapekṣyāṇavaḥ skandhāśca svayameva saṃghātārthaṃ pravartanta iti vācyam,
GSP33brsgor2u:2463: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tat ṣaḍāyatanaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2480: avidyādihetukā janmādayo janmādihetukāścāvidyādaya iti mitho hetuhetumadbhāvādarthātsaṃghātasiddhiriti śaṅkāmupasaṃharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2484: avidyādīnāmuttarottarahetutvamaṅgīkṛtya saṃghātahetvabhāvāt saṃghāto na syādityukte pūrvoktaṃ smārayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2486: kimavidyādayaḥ saṃghātasya gamakā utotpādakā iti vikalpyādye saṃghātasyotpādakaṃ kiñcidvācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2491: yadā sthireṣvaṇuṣu saṃghātayogyeṣu kartṛṣu cādṛṣṭasahāyeṣu satsu jñānābhāvamātreṇa
GSP33brsgor2u:2501: svābhāvikaḥ khalvayaṃ saṃghātānāṃ hetuhetumadbhāvena pravāho na saṃhantāramapekṣate,
GSP33brsgor2u:2506: kiñca bhoktuḥ kṣaṇikatvapakṣe bhogāpavargavyavahāro 'pi durghaṭa ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2508: yo yadicchati sa tatkāle nāsti cedicchāvyarthā,
GSP33brsgor2u:2515: dvividho hi kāryasamutpādaḥ sugatasaṃmato hetvadhīnaḥ kāraṇasamudāyādhīnaśceti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2524: nanu kāryakāle vināśavyāptatve 'pi pūrvakṣaṇe sattvāt kṣaṇikārthasya hetutvamakṣatamiti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:2532: uktaṃ hi 'bhūtiryeṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyata'iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2533: yeṣāṃ kṣaṇikābhāvānāṃ yā bhūtiḥ saiva kriyā kārakaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2560: viṣayakaraṇasahakārisaṃskārāścaturvidhā hetavastān pratītya prāpya cittaṃ rūpādivijñānaṃ caittāścittātmakāḥ sukhādayaśca jāyanta iti pratijñārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2567: sahetukatvapakṣe 'nvayikāraṇasya mṛdādeḥ kāryasahabhāvāpattyā kṣaṇikatvapratijñāhāniriti sūtraśeṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33brsgor2u:2583: pratīpā pratikūlā saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā,
GSP33brsgor2u:2591: tasmin saṃtāne caramakṣaṇaḥ kṣaṇāntaraṃ karoti vā na vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2621: nanvāgamaprāmāṇye vipratipannānsugatānpratyākāśasya vastutvaṃ kathaṃ sidhyatītyata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2628: yathaikaghaṭasattve 'pi ghaṭasāmānyābhāvo nāsti tathaikapakṣisattve 'pi mūrtadravyasāmānyābhāvātmakākāśo nāstyeveti pakṣyantarasaṃcāro na syādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2635: kiṃ samyak niśraya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃsaṃniśrayā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2651: yo 'hamadaḥ pūrvamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya tatsmarāmīti pratyabhijñānākāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2656: draṣṭṛsmartrorbhede 'haṃ smarāmi anyo 'drākṣīditi pratītiḥ syādityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2660: smarāmyahamanyo 'drākṣīditi pratyayo yatra tatra bhinnameva kartāraṃ loko 'vagacchatītyavivādamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2663: yathāgnerauṣṇyādikaṃ na bādhate kaścittathā nāhamadrākṣamiti pūrvadarśanaṃ na nihnuta ityanena bādhābhāvāt pratyabhijñā prametyuktaṃ bhavati
GSP33brsgor2u:2668: vartamānadaśāmārabhyottamāducchvāsādāmaraṇādanantarāmanantarāṃ svasyaiva pratipattimātmaikakartṛkāṃ pratyabhijānannā janmanaścāvartamānadaśāparyantamatītāḥ pratipattīḥ svakartṛkāḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:2672: sādṛśyajñānasya dharmipratiyogijñānādhīnatvāt sthirasya jñāturasattvānna sādṛśyajñānaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP33brsgor2u:2677: kiṃ tarhi kaścideṣa vikalpaḥ svākārameva bāhyatvena viṣayīkurvāṇaḥ kṣaṇāntarāsparśī,
GSP33brsgor2u:2680: atra vaktavyaṃ sādṛśyapratyaye tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vastutrayaṃ bhāsate na veti /
GSP33brsgor2u:2685: atha bhāsate vastutrayaṃ tacca pratyayābhinnameva na bāhyamiti cet / na /
GSP33brsgor2u:2689: vastutrayaṃ jñeyaṃ sādṛśyapratyayādbhinnaṃ sarvalokaprasiddhaṃ taccennāṅgīkriyate sthāyidraṣṭṛprasaṅgabhayena,
GSP33brsgor2u:2690: tarhi tattadākārāṇāṃ kṣaṇikavijñānānāṃ mitho vārtānabhijñatvādekasmin dharmiṇi viruddhānekapakṣasphuraṇātmakavipratipattyasaṃbhavāt svapakṣasādhanādivyavahāro
GSP33brsgor2u:2692: tathā ca tenedaṃ sadṛśamiti bāhyārthayorjñānapūrvakaṃ sādṛśyaṃ jānata ātmanaḥ sthāyitvaṃ durvāramityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2699: na cedānīṃ ghaṭa iti pratyakṣamavartamānakālāsattvaṃ ghaṭasya gocarayadvartamānakṣaṇamātrasatvarūpe kṣaṇikatve mānamiti vācyam,
GSP33brsgor2u:2705: kiñca sādṛśyaṃ pratyabhijñāyāṃ doṣayatā nimittaṃ viṣayatayā vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2713: so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyā bhramatvaṃ nirasya saṃśayatvaṃ nirasyati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2715: jaḍārthe pratyabhijñāte 'pi bādhasaṃbhāvanayā saṃśayaḥ kadācit syānnātmanītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2721: abhāvaḥ śaśaviṣāṇavadatyantāsannityaṅgīkṛtya mṛdādināśādasato ghaṭādikaṃ jāyate iti sugatā vadanti,
GSP33brsgor2u:2724: na kevalaṃ balādāpadyate kintu svayaṃ darśayanti ca /
GSP33brsgor2u:2732: nityasya niratiśayasya kāryaśaktatve tatkāryāṇi sarvāṇyekasminneva kṣaṇe syuḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2763: naca śaktasya sahakāryapekṣā na yukteti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2787: tasmādbhrāntimūlena kṣaṇikabāhyārthavādena kūṭasthanityabrahmasamanvayasya na virodha iti siddham //27//
GSP33brsgor2u:2792: akhaṇḍanirviśeṣaṃ brahma vijñānaṃ bāhyārthopādānaṃ vadatāṃ vedāntānāṃ bhinnaṃ sākāraṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:2793: kṣaṇikaṃ vijñānaṃ na tato 'nyor'tho 'stīti yogācāramatena virudhyate na veti tanmatasya
GSP33brsgor2u:2798: iti vadan vijñānavādinaḥ sugatābhiprāyajñatvena mandādhikāribhyo bāhyārthavādibhyaḥ śraiṣṭhyamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2808: mukhya eva bhedaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2811: ato buddhyārūḍhākāra eva prameyaṃ na bāhyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2824: jātiguṇakarmaṇāṃ dharmiṇaḥ sakāśādabhede 'tyantabhede vā dharmivaddharmyantaravacca na dharmadharmibhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2825: bhedābhedau ca viruddhāviti na santi jātyādyarthā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2849: ubhayavādisaṃmatatvācca vāsanā eva jñānavaicitryahetavo na bāhyārthā ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2851: kṣaṇikavijñānamātravādasya mānamūlatvāttena nityavijñānavādo virudhyata iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33brsgor2u:2870: asattvaṃ vā asattvaniścayo vā ayuktatvaṃ vā utkaṭakoṭikasaṃśayātmakasaṃbhavasyābhāvo vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2876: asaṃbhavo 'sattvaniścayaḥ pramāṇābhāvādhīno na vaiparītyamiti vyavasthāmeva sphuṭayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2878: uktavyavasthāyāḥ phalaṃ bāhyārthasya pratyakṣādibhiḥ saṃbhavaṃ vadanneva tṛtīyaṃ dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2882: na hyasthūlasyaikasya vijñānasya sthūlānekasamūhālambanasya viṣayābhedo yuktaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:2923: evaṃ pakṣasādhyahetudṛṣṭāntabhedābhāve idaṃ kṣaṇikamasaditi pratijñā na yuktā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2926: sarvānekārthānāṃ jñānamātratve mithaḥ pareṇavā durjñānatvāt uttaranīlajñānaṃ vāsyaṃ pūrvanīlajñānaṃ vāsakamiti pratijñā na yuktā,
GSP33brsgor2u:2934: ajñānenāsya bandho jñānenāsya mokṣa iti ca pratijñā bahvarthajñānasādhyā /
GSP33brsgor2u:2935: ādipadena sāmānyata iṣṭaṃ grāhyamaniṣṭaṃ tyājyamiti śiṣyahitepadeśo 'nekajñānasādhyo gṛhītaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:2942: viruddhaṃ svīkṛtyāviruddhaṃ tyajatā bauddhatanayena mauḍhyaṃ darśitamityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:2952: anavasthā ca sāmyaṃ ceti doṣadvayaṃ pariharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:2954: anityajñānasya janmādimatvena ghaṭavajjaḍasya svena svīyajanmādigrahāyogādasti grāhakākāṅkṣā,
GSP33brsgor2u:2964: svayaṃ prathata iti bruvatā jñātṛśūnyatvaṃ coktā syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:2967: vijñānasya svānyajñātṛśūnyatvamiṣṭameva tvayāpādyate na cāsattvāpattiḥ jñātrabhāvāditi vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3001: kiñca pramāṇajānubhava upalabdhiḥ pakṣo 'pramāṇajaṃ svapnajñānaṃ dṛṣṭānta iti vaidharmyāntaram /
GSP33brsgor2u:3006: asaṃbandhaścāvartamānaśca smṛterartho viṣaya iti nirālambanatvamapyasyāḥ kadācidbhavet,
GSP33brsgor2u:3016: vastuto ghaṭādyanubhavasya nirālambanatvaṃ dharmo di syāttadā kiṃ dṛṣṭāntāgraheṇa,
GSP33brsgor2u:3019: yadi na vastuto dharmo 'sti tadā kiṃ dṛṣṭāntena,
GSP33brsgor2u:3021: ataḥ svato nirālambanatvoktau sālambanatvānubhavabādhabhiyā tvayānumātumārabdhaṃ tathāpi bādho na muñcatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3032: bījādaṅkuro dṛṣṭa ityadṛṣṭe 'pi tajjātīyayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33brsgor2u:3034: nanu nirapekṣavāsanānāṃ sattve dhīvaicitryamasattve tu neti svapne dṛṣṭamiti samūlānavasthetyata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3040: abhinavārthopalabdhivaicitryasya vāsanāṃ vināpi bhāvena vyatirekavyabhicārācca na
GSP33brsgor2u:3041: kvāpi vāsanāmātrakṛtaṃ dhīvaicitryaṃ kintvarthānubhave sati vāsanāsati netyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:3044: yaḥ saṃskāraḥ sa sāśrayo loke dṛṣṭaḥ yathā vegādiriṣvādyāśrayaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3059: savikāraḥ kūṭastho vā sthāyyātmā yadi nāsti tadā saṃtānasyāvastutvāddeśādyapekṣayā yadvāsanānāmādhānaṃ nikṣepo ye ca smṛtipratyabhijñe yaśca tanmūlo vyavahāraḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3067: jñānajñeyātmakasya sarvasya sattvāsattvābhyāṃ vicārāsahatvācchūnyatāvaśiṣyata iti mādhyamikapakṣasyāpi mānamūlatvamāśaṅkaya sūtrakāraḥ kimiti na nirācakāretyata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3098: ato bhrāntyekamūlasugatasiddhāntena vedāntasiddhāntasya na virodha iti siddham //32//
GSP33brsgor2u:3103: muktakacchamate niraste muktāmbarāṇāṃ mataṃ buddhisthaṃ bhavati tannirasyata iti prasaṅgasaṅgatimāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3105: ekarūpaṃ brahmeti vaidikasiddhāntasyānaikāntavādena virodho 'sti na veti tadvādasya
GSP33brsgor2u:3135: tatra jñānāvaraṇīyaṃ darśanāvaraṇīyaṃ mohanīyamantarāyaṃ ceti ghātikarmāṇi /
GSP33brsgor2u:3141: athāghātīni catvāri karmāṇi vedanīyaṃ nāmikaṃ gotrikamāyuṣkamiti /
GSP33brsgor2u:3144: ahamatra bhavato deśikasyārhataḥ śiṣyavaṃśe praviṣṭo 'smītyabhimāno gotrikam,
GSP33brsgor2u:3148: śaktasya tasya dravībhāvātmakakalalāvasthāyā budbudāvasthāyāścārambhakaḥ kriyāviśeṣo nāmikaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3160: ghaṭāderhi sarvātmanā sadaikarūpatve prāpyātmanāpyastyeva sa iti tatprāptaye yatno na syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3171: krameṇobhayavāñchāyāṃ syādasti ca nāsti ceti tṛtīyo bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3172: yugapadubhayavāñchāyāmasti nāstīti śabdadvayasya sakṛdvakttumaśakyatvāt syādavaktavya iti caturtho bhaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3175: tṛtīyacaturthecchāyāṃ syādasti cāvaktavyaśceti saptamo bhaṅga iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3176: evamekatvamanekatvaṃ ceti dvayamādāya syādekaḥ syādeko 'nekaśca syādavaktavyaḥ syādeko vaktavyaḥ syādaneko 'vaktavyaḥ syādeko 'nekaścāvaktavyaśceti,
GSP33brsgor2u:3179: ekarūpatve sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadāstyeveti vyavahāravilopāpattiḥ syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:3182: yadasti tat sarvatra sarvadāstyeva yathā brahmātmā /
GSP33brsgor2u:3183: na caivaṃ tatprāptaye yatno na syāditi vācyam,
GSP33brsgor2u:3199: kiñca jīvādipadārthānāṃ saptatvaṃ jīvatvādirūpaṃ cāstyeva nāstyeveti ca niyatamutāniyatam /
GSP33brsgor2u:3213: ityevaṃ sarvatrānirdhāraṇe satyupadeśo niṣkampapravṛttiśca na syādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3217: yaduktamavaktavyatvaṃ tat kiṃ kenāpi śabdenāvācyatvamuta sakṛdanekaśabdāvācyatvam /
GSP33brsgor2u:3225: na cārthasya yugapadviruddhadharmavāñchāyāṃ vakturmūkatvamātramavaktavyapadena vivakṣitamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3236: ananuṣṭhānādbadhyanta ityārhatatantrāvadhṛtasvabhāvānāṃ trividhajīvānāṃ traividhyaniyamo 'pi na syādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3259: kiñca bāladehamātra ātmā tataḥ sthūle yuvadehe kvacit syāditi kṛtsnadehaḥ sajīvo na syādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3261: yathā dīpāvayavānāṃ ghaṭe saṃkoco gehe vikāsastathā jīvāvayavānāmiti dehamānatvaniyamaṃ śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:3263: dīpāṃśavajjīvāṃśā bhinnadeśā ekadeśā veti vikalpyādye 'lpadehādbahirapi jīvaḥ syāditi dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:3265: dīpasya tu na ghaṭādbahiḥ sattvamadhikāvayavānāṃ vināśāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3272: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ / BBs_2,2.35 /
GSP33brsgor2u:3273: evaṃ jīvāvayavā nityā itimate dehamānatvaṃ nirastam /
GSP33brsgor2u:3274: saṃprati jīvasya kecideva kūṭasthā avayavā anye tvāgamāpāyina iti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:3286: ādye kalpe doṣāntaraṃ vadan kalpāntaramādāya dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:3292: kiñcātmana āgamāpāyiśīlāvayavatve sati kiyanta āyāntyavayavāḥ kiyanto 'payantītyajñānādātmaniścayābhāvādanirmokṣaḥ syādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3297: gotvavatpratyekaṃ samāptāvekasmiñcharīra ātmanānātvaṃ syādato na dehaparimāṇatvasāvayavatve ātmana ityupasaṃharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:3308: sig vastraṃ vigataṃ yebhyaste visico digambarāsteṣāmityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3314: anatireke janmādivikāro vināśo muktyabhāva ityuktadoṣaprasaṅgāt saṃtānātmapakṣo 'nupapanna iti sūtrārthaḥ //35//
GSP33brsgor2u:3318: yaṃ sthūlaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā dehaṃ gṛhṇāti taddehaparimāṇa eva jīva iti niyamaṃ dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:3340: luñcitakeśamatanirasanānantaraṃ jaṭādhāriśaivamataṃ buddhisthaṃ nirākriyata iti prasaṅgasaṃgatimāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3342: sāmānyata īśvaranirāsa evātra kiṃ na syāditi śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:3348: advitīyabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ jagaditi vadato vedāntasamanvayasya kartaiveśvaro naprakṛtiriti
GSP33brsgor2u:3349: śaivādimatena virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe tanmatasya mānamūlatvādvirodhe sati vedāntoktadvayabrahmāsiddhiriti
GSP33brsgor2u:3388: tathāca loke yādṛśāḥ kartāro dṛṣṭāntādṛśā eva jagatkartāro rāgadveṣādimantaḥ sidhyeyuḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3389: yadi loke vicitraprāsādādikarturekatvādyadarśane 'pi jagatkartari lāghavādekatvaṃ nityajñānaṃ nirdeṣatvaṃ ca kalpyeta,
GSP33brsgor2u:3394: asmākaṃ tvapauruṣeyatayā svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvayā śrutyā svaprameyabodhane dṛṣṭāntānapekṣayā bhavatyeva laukikakartṛviparītādvitīyakartrupādānātmakasarvajñanirdeṣeśvaranirṇayaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:3395: nirṇīte ca tasmin dharmigrāhakamānabādhānna rāgādidoṣāpādānasyāvakāśa ityānumānikeśvaravādibhyo vaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3398: yadi karturupādānatvamadṛṣṭatvānna kalpyate tarhi nirdeṣatvasyāpyadṛṣṭatvādyo viṣamakārī sa doṣavāniti vyāptidṛṣṭeśca jagatkartā doṣavān syāt
GSP33brsgor2u:3405: yathā śabdo yadi kṛtakatvena hetunā ghaṭavadanityaḥ syāttarhi tenaiva hetunā sāvayavo 'pi syāditi /
GSP33brsgor2u:3406: na hyanityatvasya vyāpakaṃ sāvayavatvaṃ gandhādau vyabhicārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3407: nanu prāṇikarmaprerita īśvaro viṣamaphalān prāṇinaḥ karoti na svecchayeti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:3413: atītakarmaṇā prerita īśvaro vartamānaṃ karma tatphalāya prerayatītyanāditvātpreryaprerakabhāvasya nānupapattiriti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:3418: tato 'pyatītakarmapreriteśvarapreritaṃ tadeveśvaraṃ vartamāne karmaṇi phaladānāya prerayati cet / na /
GSP33brsgor2u:3421: yattu phaladāne īśvarasya karma nimittamātraṃ na prerakamiti noktadoṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:3435: udāsīnaḥ pravartaka iti ca vyāhṛtamiti yogānpratyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3443: sa ca saṃyegaḥ samavāyo vā nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3446: īśvarapreritapradhānakāryaṃ jagaditi siddhaṃ cet saṃbandhakalpanā syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3480: naca yadyenādhiṣṭheyaṃ tattadīyabhogahetutve sati pratyakṣamiti vyatirekavyāptau karaṇeṣu vyabhicāratādavasthyamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3488: īśvare tu pradhānakṛtāste na dṛśyanta ityakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3495: yaḥ pravartakaścetanaḥ sa śarīrīti loke vyāptidṛṣṭerīśvarasya ca śarīrānupapatterna pravartakatvamiti sūtrārthamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3502: naca nityaṃ śarīraṃ sargātprāgapi saṃbhavatīti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3507: jīvasyaiva śarīraṃ bhautikamīśvarasya tu svecchānirmitaṃ prāgapi syādityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyati-
GSP33brsgor2u:3515: evamīśvarasya śuṣkatarkeṇa kartṛtvanirṇayo netyupapādya nityatvasarvajñatvanirṇayo 'pi na saṃbhavatītyāha sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33brsgor2u:3522: yadyapi saṃkhyāvatvamātraṃ hetuḥ saṃbhavati tathāpi sarvajñaniścayena hetvasiddhinirāsaṃ dyotayituṃ niścitapadam /
GSP33brsgor2u:3531: nanu pradhānapuruṣeśvarāstraya iti jñāte 'pi jīvānāmānantyātkathaṃ saṃkhyāniścayaḥ, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3537: māṣarāśivatkeṣāñcijjīvānāṃ saṃghastadbandhaśca naśyedityevaṃ sarvamukteridānīṃ śūnyaṃ jagatsyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3554: tasmāt kevalakartrīśvaravādasya nirmūlatvānna tartrupādānādvayeśvarasamanvayavirodha iti siddham //41//
GSP33brsgor2u:3567: sa kiṃ jīvotpattyādyaṃśe mānaṃ naveti saṃdehe bādhānupalambhānmānamiti pūrvapakṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:3578: yathoktavyūhavantaṃ sarvaprakṛtiṃ nirañjanaṃ vijñānarūpaṃ paramātmānamiti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor2u:3598: yasmāt kartuḥ karaṇotpattirna dṛśyate tasmādasaṃgatā kalpanetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3599: siddhānāṃ karaṇānāṃ prayoktā karteti prasiddhyartho hiśabdaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3602: nanu loke kaścicchilpivaraḥ kuṭhāraṃ nirmāya tena vṛkṣaṃ chinattīti dṛṣṭamiti cet /
GSP33brsgor2u:3606: vinaiva karaṇaṃ kartṛtve vā manovaiyarthyamiti bhāvaḥ //43//
GSP33brsgor2u:3629: kiṃ catvāraḥ svatantrā bhinnā eva utaikasya vikāratvenābhinnāḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3632: dvitīye vikārāḥ prakṛtitulyā vā nyūnā vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:3637: yadi nyūnā api bhagavato vyūhāstadā catuṣṭvavyāghāta ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3645: ādipadāt pradyumnāniruddhau bhinnāvātmana ityuktvātmana evaite iti viruddhoktigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3651: iti śrīparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brsgor2u:3652: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ  ____________________________________________________________________________________________
GSP33brsgor2u:3666: yathā mithovirodhāt pūrvāparavirodhācca parapakṣā upekṣyāstathā śrutipakṣo 'pi upekṣya iti śaṅkotthāne pādadvayasyārambhāt pūrvapādena dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatiriti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3669: jīvasya prāṇānāṃ cotpattiṃ 'sarva eta ātmano vyuccaranti'iti vājinaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3679: saṃdehe yadyutpattistadā vākyabhedena virodhādaprāmāṇyamanayoḥ śrutyoriti pūrvapakṣayiṣyannādāvanutpattikṣamekadeśi gṛhṇātītyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3691: ekasya yugapatkāryadvayāsaṃbandhe 'pi krameṇa saṃbandhasaṃbhavādekavākyateti mukhyasiddhāntī śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:3704: kiñca satpadārtha ātmā chāndogye tejasa upādānaṃ śrūyate,
GSP33brsgor2u:3710: evaṃ śrutyorvirodhādaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣe prāpte sa eva viyadanutpattivādi svamatena prāmāṇyaṃ brūta ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3712: evamādhyāyasamāpteradhikaraṇeṣu prathamaṃ virodhācchrutyaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ tata ekadeśisiddhāntaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3713: paścānmukhyasiddhānte śrutīnāmavirodhenaika vākyatayā brahmaṇi samanvayasiddhiriti phalaṃ kramaścetyavagantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:3714: tatra śrutyorvirodhe satyadhyayanavidhyupāttayoraprāmāṇyayogādviyadutpattyasaṃbhavarūpatakrānugṛhītacchāndogyaśrutirmukhyārthā itarā gauṇītyavirodha ityekadeśimataṃ vivṛṇoti-
GSP33brsgor2u:3719: saṃyoga eva hi dravyasyāsamavāyikāraṇamataḥ samavāyyasamavāyinorabhāvānna hetvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3790: evamākāśasyānutpattau sarvaśrutīnāmavirodha ityekadeśisiddhāntaḥ prāptastaṃ mukhyasiddhāntī dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:3797: tathāpi jīvādivadanutpannasyāpi nabhaso brahmaṇi kalpitatvenāvyatirekātpratijñāsiddhiḥ kiṃ na syāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:3806: tasmātpratijñāsiddhaye ākāśasya kāryatvenaivāvyatireko vācya iti dṛṣṭāntasṛṣṭisārvātmyaśabdānāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3818: vastuni vikalpāsaṃbhavena tayoḥ śākhābhedena prāthamyavyavasthāyā ayogāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:3841: nānārthakaprayoge tu paya ānayetyādāvāvṛttyā vākyabheda eva /
GSP33brsgor2u:3845: ekasya śabdasyāvṛttiṃ vinānekārthatvaṃ nāsti cedasṛjateti śabdasya chāndogya upasaṃhṛtākāśādisaṃbandhārthamāvṛttidoṣaḥ syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3850: śrutyantarasthaḥ kramaḥ śrutyantare grāhya ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3854: tejaḥprāthamyasvīkāre ākāśasargo dharmi taddharmaḥ prāthamyaṃ ceti dvayaṃ śrutaṃ bādhanīyamiti gauravam,
GSP33brsgor2u:3855: ākāśaprāthamye tvārthikatejaḥ sargaprāthamyamātrabādha iti lāghavamiti matvāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3857: kiñca pradhānadharmityāgādvaraṃ guṇabhūtasya tejaḥprāthamyasya dharmasya tyāga ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3859: kiñca kiṃ sṛṣṭiparaśrutisiddhatvāttejaḥprāthamyaṃ gṛhyata uta prathamasthāne tejasaḥ sargaśrutyārthātprāthamyabhānāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3864: yaduktaṃ vastuni vikalpāsaṃbhavādubhayoḥ prāthamyaṃ śākhābhedena vyavasthitaṃ na bhavati,
GSP33brsgor2u:3871: viyadanutpattivādinoktamanūdya pratijñāyā advitīyaśruteśca mukhyārthatātparyāvagamānna gauṇārthateti dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:3874: udakaṃ kṣīrasthamapi kṣīrajñānānna gṛhyate bhedāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3882: ubhayagauṇatve 'dbhutavadupanyāso mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaistatsādhanaṃ ca na syāditi doṣāntaramāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3887: kāryameva vastvekadeśa ākāśo notpadyate sāmagrīśūnyatvādityatra ākāśo vikāraḥ vibhaktatvāt ghaṭādivaditi satpratipakṣamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3889: yo vibhaktaḥ sa vikāra ityanvayamuktvā yastvavikāraḥ sa na vibhakto yathātmeti vyatirikavyāptimāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3896: dharmisamānasattākavibhāgasya hetutvātparamārthātmani vibhāgasya kalpitatvena bhinnasattākatvānna vyabhicāra ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3903: ghaṭavadityābhāsatulyamidamanumānamityāśaṅkyātmanaḥ paramakāraṇatvena śrutasya kāryatve śūnyatāprasaṅga iti bādhakasattvāttasyābhāvatvaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3904: nātra kiñcidbādhakamasti pratyuta ākāśasyākāryatve nityānekadravyakalpanā śrautapratijñāhānyādayo bādhakāḥ santīti nābhāsatulyatetyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3909: ādye yo jñātā sa pariśiṣyata iti na śūnyatā /
GSP33brsgor2u:3918: yaduktaṃ sureśvarācāryaiḥ-'pramātā ca pramāṇaṃ ca prameyaṃ pramitistathā /
GSP33brsgor2u:3925: nanu prameyasyāpi svaprakāśatvaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3928: ātmāpi mānādhīnasiddhikaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3931: gehe ghaṭo dṛṣṭo na veti jñānasaṃśaye na dṛṣṭa iti vyatirekaniścaye cārthasvarūpaniścayāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:3939: svaprakāśasyāpi bādhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3941: jaḍaṃ hi parāyattaprakāśatvādāgantukaṃ bādhayogyaṃ na prakāśātmasvarūpaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:3944: nahi sunipuṇenāpi svābhāvo draṣṭuṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3945: evaṃ svataḥ sphūrtitvādātmā na bādhya ityuktvā svataḥ sattākatvācca na bādhya ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3947: jñānajñeyayoḥ sattāvyabhicāre 'pi jñātuḥ sadaikarūpatvānna sattāvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3952: anyathāsvabhāvatvaṃ mithyātvaṃ vā saṃbhāvayitumapi na śakyam,
GSP33brsgor2u:3979: yadyapyadṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyukte aṇumanasī ādyakarmārambhake tathāpi karmasamavāyina ekatvādanekatvaniyamabhaṅga ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:3985: na tvabhyupagamyate tasmānnaiṣa niyama iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:3986: yattu kṣīraparamāṇuṣu rasāntarotpattau taireva dadhyārambha iti /
GSP33brsgor2u:3991: loke kartu- sahāyadarśanādasahāyādbrahmaṇaḥ kathaṃ sarga iti, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4000: na hyākāśābhāvastaddharmo vā kāṭhinyaṃ kintu mūrtadravyaviśeṣastasaṃyogaviśeṣo vā kāṭhinyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4014: sarvamūrtadravyasaṃyogaḥ parimāṇaviśeṣo vā vibhutvaṃ nirguṇātmani dṛṣṭānte nāsti /
GSP33brsgor2u:4024: nanu 'sa yathānanto 'yamākāśa evamananta ātmā'iti śrutirnityatvenaiva sāmyaṃ brūte,
GSP33brsgor2u:4039: balavattittiriśrutyā chāndogyaśruternayanādekavākyatayā sraṣṭari brahmātmani samanvaya ityupasaṃharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4047: 'ākāśādvāyuḥ'iti śrutyā virodho 'sti na veti ekavākyatvabhāvābhāvabhyāṃ saṃśaye gauṇapakṣapūrvapakṣasiddhāntapakṣānatidiśati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4050: tatra vāyutejasostulyavadānantarye vāyoragniriti kramaśrutibādhātpaurvāparye tejaḥprāthamyabhaṅgānnaikavākyateti pūrvapakṣe gauṇavādyabhiprāyamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4059: tathācākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā tejo 'sṛjateti śrutyorekavākyatayā brahmaṇi samanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4074: 'na cāsya kaścijjanitā'ityādi brahmānāditvaśrutīnāṃ 'tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ'ityutpattiśrutyā
GSP33brsgor2u:4075: virodho 'sti na vetyekavākyatvabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃdehe 'sti virodha iti pūrvapakṣe
GSP33brsgor2u:4094: tathāhi-kiṃ sanmātrasya brahmaṇaḥ sanmātrameva sāmānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ sadviśeṣo vā asadvā /
GSP33brsgor2u:4110: 'tattejo 'sṛjata'iti 'vāyoragniḥ'iti ca śrutyorvirodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe sāmānyātsāmānyotpattyasaṃbhave
GSP33brsgor2u:4117: tejasa upādānaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ brahmaivopādānamityarthe śrutīnāṃ bhūyastvācca tadanurodhādvāyoriti
GSP33brsgor2u:4131: naca 'bahu syām'iti kāryābhede kṣaṇiliṅgādupādānatvasiddhiḥ liṅgācchruterbalīyastvena śrutyavirodhena liṅgasya neyatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:4132: nayanaṃ cetthaṃ vāyorbrahmānanyatvādvāyujasyāpi tejaso brahmaprakṛtikatvamaviruddhamiti siddhāntagranthāśayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4138: ūrdhvamanantaramiti vopapadaṃ vinā pañcamīmātrātkramo na bhātīti kalpya upapadārthayogaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4140: viśeṣato 'tra prakaraṇādapādānārthatvaṃ pañcamyāḥ kḷptaṃ kḷptena ca kalpyaṃ sati virodhe bādhyamiti sthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4143: tasyā dhenoḥ śṛtaṃ taptaṃ kṣīraṃ sākṣātkāryaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4162: tathā hyātharvaṇe muṇḍakagranthe 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇica /
GSP33brsgor2u:4163: khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī'iti mantre 'pāṃ brahmajatvaṃ śrutam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4164: 'agnerāpaḥ'iti śrutyā tasya virodho 'sti na veti saṃdehe tulyatvādasti virodha iti
GSP33brsgor2u:4170: trivṛtkṛtayoraptejasorvirodhe 'pyagnerāpa iti vacanādatīndriyayostayornāsti virodha iti nirṇīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4171: na kevalaṃ śrutyavirodhajñānāyāyamatideśaḥ kintu pañcabhūcatotpattikramanirṇayārthaṃ cetyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4181: atra śrutau yadyannamodanādikaṃ tadā 'adbhyaḥ pṛthivī'iti śrutyā virodhaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4182: yadi pṛthivī tadā na virodha iti phalaṃ bodhyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4186: tathāca kvacidannaṃ kvacidadbhayaḥ pṛthivī tato 'nnamiti virodhānnaikavākyateti prāpte siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4194: abānantaryaṃ pṛthivyāḥ sthānaṃ śrutyantarasiddhaṃ tenāpyannasya pṛthivītvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4195: tattatra sṛṣṭikāle yadapāṃ śaraḥ yo maṇḍavaddhanībhāva āsītsa eva samahanyata kaṭhinaḥ saṃghāto 'bhūt sāpāṃ kaṭhinā pariṇatiḥ pṛthivyabhavaditi śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4208: evaṃ tittiriśrutyanusāreṇa chandogaśruternayanādaviruddho bhūtasṛṣṭiśrutīnāṃ brahmaṇi samanvaya iti siddham //12//
GSP33brsgor2u:4211: tadabhidhyānād eva tu talliṅgāt saḥ / BBs_2,3.13 /
GSP33brsgor2u:4212: saṃprati tāni bhūtānyāśrityāśrayāśrayibhāvasaṃgatyā teṣāṃ svātantryamāśaṅkya niṣedhati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4217: nanvatra bhūtānāṃ kiṃ svātantryeṇopādānatvamāśaṅkyate kartṛtvaṃ vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:4222: yathā manuṣyādiśabdaistattaddehābhimānino jīvā ucyante tathā 'ākāśādvāyuḥ'ityādiśrutāvākāśādiśabdaistattadbhūtābhimānidevatā ucyante,
GSP33brsgor2u:4224: evaṃ 'tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta'iti śrutau svayamiti viśeṣaṇādbrahmaṇo 'nyānapekṣasarvakartṛtvasaṃbhavānnirapekṣanimittatvaṃ śrutam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4225: tathāca mithonirapekṣeśvarabhūtakartṛśrutyorvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvaya iti saphalaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4228: yathā ākāśādibhāvāpannabrahmaṇaḥ sarvopādānatvaṃ tathā tadabhimānidevatājīvabhāvamāpannabrahmaṇaḥ kartṛtvamiti paramparayā īśvarakartṛtvaśrutyavirodhaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:4232: ākāśādiśabdairna devatālakṣaṇā mukhyārthe bādhakābhāvāt pañcamyaśca prakṛtitvārthāstatra rūḍhataratvāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:4235: yadyapi devatānāṃ kartṛtvaṃ saṃbhavati tathāpīśvaraniyamyatvaśravaṇāccetanānāmapi na svātantryaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4236: kimu vācyamacetanānāṃ bhūtānāṃ na svātantryamiti matvoktam-
GSP33brsgor2u:4238: tattadacetanātmanāvasthitasya brahmaṇa upādānatve 'pi jīvavyāvṛtteśvaratvākāreṇaiva sākṣātsarvakartṛtvaṃ na jīvatvadvārā tasya sarvaniyantṛtvālliṅgādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:4243: parameśvarasyāntaryāmibhāvenāveśaḥ saṃbandhastadvaśādbhūteṣvīkṣaṇaśravaṇaṃ naitāvatā teṣāṃ cetanatvaṃ svātantryaṃ vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4245: itthaṃ sūtrayojanā-sa īśvarastattadātmanā sthito 'pi sākṣādeva sarvakartā tasyāntaryāmitvaliṅgāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:4246: jīvatvadvārā kartṛtvaṃ nāma jīvasyaiva kartṛtvamityantaryāmiṇaḥ kartṛtvāsiddherantaryāmitvāyogāttadabhidhyānādīśvarekṣaṇādeva bhūteṣu śrutekṣaṇopapatteśceti
GSP33brsgor2u:4247: tatteja aikṣateti śruta īkṣitā paramātmaivetyatra śrutyantaraṃ prakaraṇaṃ cāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4252: viparyayeṇa tu kramo 'ta upapadyate ca / BBs_2,3.14 /
GSP33brsgor2u:4254: yadyapyatra śrutivirodho na parihriyata ityasaṃgatistathāpyutpattikrame nirūpite layakramo buddhistho vicāryata iti prāsaṅgikyāveva pādāvāntarasaṃgatī iti matvāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4256: atrotpattikramādviparītakramanirṇayātsiddhānte bhūtānāṃ prātilemyena layadhyānapūrvakaṃ pratyagbrahmaṇi manaḥsamādhānaṃ phalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4257: pūrvapakṣe tu kāraṇanāśe sati kāryanāśa iti sarvalayādhārabrahmāsiddheruktasamādhyasiddhiriti bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4258: sati mahābhūtānāṃ laye kramacintā sa eva nāstīti kecittānpratyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4260: aniyama ityanāsthayoktaṃ śrautasya pralayasya kramākāṅkṣāyāṃ śrauta utpattikrama eva grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4262: sati kāraṇe kāryaṃ naśyatīti loke dṛśyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:4263: tathāca śrauto 'pyutpattikramo laye na gṛhyate kintu laukikakrama eva gṛhyate śruterlokadṛṣṭapadārthabodhādhīnatvena śrautādapi laukikasyāntaraṅgatvādyogyatvācca
GSP33brsgor2u:4264: kāraṇameva hi kāryasya svarūpamiti tadananyatvanyāyena sthāpitam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4265: na hi svarūpanāśe kāryasya kṣaṇamapi sthitiryuktā tasmādayogya utpattikramo layasya na grāhyaḥ laukikakramāvarodhena nirākāṅkṣātvāditi siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4271: 'vāyuśca līyate vyomni taccāvyakte pralīyate'iti smṛtiśeṣa ādipadārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4275: antarā vijñānamanasī krameṇa talliṅgād iti cen nāviśeṣāt / BBs_2,3.15 /
GSP33brsgor2u:4277: uktabhūtotpattilayakramamupajīvya sa kiṃ karaṇotpattikrameṇa virudhyate na veti karaṇānāmabhautikatvabhautikatvābhyāṃ saṃdehe vṛttānuvādapūrvakaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:4289: ātmano bhūtānāṃ cāntarā madhye talliṅgātsṛṣṭivākyāt 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ'ityādirūpādvijñānamanasī anukramyete /
GSP33brsgor2u:4293: tathā cātmanaḥ prathamamākāśasya janma paścādvāyorityuktakramasyātmanaḥ karaṇāni
GSP33brsgor2u:4294: tato bhūtānīti krameṇa virodha iti tittiryatharvaṇaśrutyorvirodhānna brahmaṇi samanvaya
GSP33brsgor2u:4298: 'ātmana ākāśaḥ'ityādi tittiriśrutau pañcamyāḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvenārthataḥ kramo bhāti /
GSP33brsgor2u:4305: karaṇānāṃ vibhaktatvena kāryatayā kāraṇākāṅkṣāyāmannamayamityādiśruterākāṅkṣitoktyarthamasati bādhake mayaṭo vikārārthatāyā yuktatvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:4306: prācuryārthatve tvanākāṅkṣitoktiprasaṅgācchrutyaiva tejobannaprāśena vākprāṇamanasāṃ vṛddhistadabhāve tannāśa iti vikāratvasya darśitatvānna vivādāvasaraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4307: yadvā sthūlabhūtādhīnā teṣāṃ vṛddhirvikāro mayaḍarthaḥ śrūyamāṇo bhautikatve liṅgaṃ prāṇendriyamanāṃsi bhautikāni bhūtādhīnavṛddhimattvāddehavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4308: nanu teṣāṃ bhautikatve kathamātharvaṇe pṛthak tajjanmakathanaṃ bhūtajanmoktyaiva tajjanmasiddherityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4316: idaṃ sthūlamutpatteḥ prāk prajāpatiḥ sūtrātmāsīt atra sūkṣmabhūtātmakaprajāpattisargaḥ prathamastato manaādisarga iti kramo bhātīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4321: carācaravyapāśrayas tu syāt tadvyapadeśo bhāktas tadbhāvabhāvitvāt / BBs_2,3.16 /
GSP33brsgor2u:4323: evaṃ tāvattatpadavācyakāraṇanirṇayāya bhūtaśrutīnāṃ virodho nirastaḥ idānīmā pādamāptestvaṃpadārthaśuddhyai jīvaśrutīnāṃ virodho nirasyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:4324: iha jīvo 'na jāyate mriyate'ityādiśruterjāteṣṭiśrāddhaśāstreṇa virodho 'sti na veti
GSP33brsgor2u:4328: tathāca karaṇotpattikrameṇa bhūtakramasya bādhābhāve 'pi jīvotpattikrameṇa bādhaḥ syāditi pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4331: cetanajanmādyuddeśena cetanasya tasya janmāntarīyaphalasādhanaṃ jātakarmādisaṃskāro vidhīyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:4332: tathā coddeśyavidheyayormithovirodhe sati 'vidheyāvirodhenoddeśyaṃ neyam'iti nyāyājjanmādikaṃ dehopādhikaṃ na svata iti siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4336: jīve tu bhākto gauṇa aupādhikajanmādiviṣayaḥ syādupādhijanmabhāve bhāvādasatyabhāvāditi sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4349: nātmā śruter nityatvāc ca tābhyaḥ / BBs_2,3.17 /
GSP33brsgor2u:4352: 'sa eṣa iha praviṣṭa ānakhāgrebhyaḥ' 'aja ātmā'ityādyanutpattiśrutīnāṃ ca mithovirodhātsaṃśaye
GSP33brsgor2u:4355: kalpādyantayornabhasa iva jīvasya tau kiṃ na syātāṃ tatsaṃbhavāditi pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4359: nanvavikṛtaṃ brahmaivātra praviṣṭaṃ jīvo na tattvāntaramiti pratijñāsiddhiḥ, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4368: evaṃ vikāratve sati vikāraprapañcātmanā svātmānamakurutetivadvikārajīvātmanā praveśa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4384: strīmaya itivajjīvasya svarūpājñānādbuddhyādiparatantratvena bhedakartṛtvādibhāktvātprācuryārthe mayaṭprayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4389: etebhyo dehātmana pariṇatebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ sāmyenotthāya janitvā tānyeva līyamānānyanu paścādvinaśyati /
GSP33brsgor2u:4394: upādhilayādviśeṣajñānābhāva eva saṃjñābhāvo nātmasvarūpavijñānābhāva ityuttaraṃ pratipādayati śrutirityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4395: atraivātmani vijñānaghane pretyasaṃjñā nāstītyuktyā mā mohāntaṃ mohamadhyaṃ bhrāntimāpīpadadāpāditavānimamarthaṃ na jānāmi brūhi tvadukterarthamiti maitreyīpraśnārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4398: mohaṃ mohakaraṃ vākyamucchittiḥ pūrvāvasthānāśo dharmo 'syetyucchittidharmā pariṇāmī sa netyanucchittidharmāpariṇāmī,
GSP33brsgor2u:4400: tarhi na pretya saṃjñeti kathamuktaṃ, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4405: jīvasya vikāritve muktyayogāttattvamasīti vākyamakhaṇḍanārthamiti ca vaktavyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4414: anutpattau hi svaprakāśaṃ brahmaivopahitaṃ jīva iti jīvasya svaprakāśatā sidhyati /
GSP33brsgor2u:4418: tathāca pūrvapakṣe jīvasya brahmaikyāyogyatā siddhānte tadyogyatetyāpādasamāpteḥ phalamavagantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4423: yathāśrute bhāṣye hetoḥ sādhyāviśeṣa iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4427: na kevala svaprakāśabrahmābhedājjīvasya svaprakāśatā kintu śrutito 'pītyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4430: asuptaḥ svayaṃ bhāsamāna evātmā saptāṃlluptavyāpārānvāgādīnabhilakṣya cākaśīti /
GSP33brsgor2u:4432: atra svapne vijñāturbuddhisattvasya sākṣiṇo vijñātervināśo nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4435: ātmano nityacidrūpatve 'pi svato 'saṅgatayā gandhādyasaṃbandhāttatsaṃbandhaghaṭanātmakavṛttyarthāni jñānasādhanānīti na teṣāṃ vaiyarthyamityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4441: tattadāsuṣuptau na paśyatīti yattatpaśyannevāluptajñāna eva sanna paśyatītyatra hetuḥ-
GSP33brsgor2u:4453: kiñca niravayavātmano manaḥ-saṃyogānnānityajñānaguṇatā samavāyābhāvācca na svasamavetajñānavedyatā karmakartṛtvavirodhācca /
GSP33brsgor2u:4454: kiñca jñānatvasyaikavṛttitve lāghavādātmaiva jñānaṃ vṛtteśca manaḥpariṇāmatvaśrutyā
GSP33brsgor2u:4473: sa mumūrṣuḥ jīva etairbuddhyādibhistasmāccandralokādimaṃ lokaṃ prati karma kartumāyātītyarthaḥ //19//
GSP33brsgor2u:4477: utkrāntirātmano dehānnirgamo na bhavati yenāṇutvaṃ syāt kintu svāmitvanivṛttiriti kecit /
GSP33brsgor2u:4481: pākānāśrayasya paktṛtvavadratyanāśrayasyāpi gantṛtvoktiḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4492: anyebhyo vā mukhādibhya eṣa ātmā niṣkrāmatīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4495: indriyāṇi gṛhṇansvāpādau hṛdayaṃ sa jīvo gacchati śukraṃ prakāśakamindriyagrāmamādāya punarjāgaritasthānamāgacchatītyarthaḥ //20//
GSP33brsgor2u:4517: bālāgrāduddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāgastasmādapyuddhṛtaḥ śatatamo bhāgo jīva iti,
GSP33brsgor2u:4521: tasmāduddhṛtā mātrā mānaṃ yasya sa jīvastathā //22//
GSP33brsgor2u:4530: avasthitivaiśeṣyād iti cen nābhyupagamād dhṛdi hi / BBs_2,3.24 /
GSP33brsgor2u:4547: kādācitkaṃ tu dehaparimāṇatvamityuktvā svata eva vyāpitvamiti matāntaramāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4559: naca prabhāyāṃ vyabhicārastasyā api dravyatvāditi prāpte gandhe vyabhicāramāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4573: tathāca gurutvāpacayo na bhavatīti hetoranyathāsiddhiriti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4581: ato gandhasya puṣpādisthasyaiva guṇavyatireko vācya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4599: vijñānamindriyāṇāṃ jñānaśaktiṃ vijñānena caitanyaguṇenādāya śeta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4604: tatrātmāṇutvavibhutvaśrutīnāṃ virodhādaprāmāṇyaprāptāvaṇutvaṃ jīvasya vibhutvamīśvarasyetyavirodha ityekadeśipakṣo darśitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4610: etena jīvasya brahmabedajñāne 'ṇutvābhāvadhīstasyāṃ tadityanyonyāśraya iti nirastam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4618: yadyaṇvātmasaṃbandhasya tvagvyāptyā dehavyāpinī vedanā syāttarhyatiprasaṅga iti dūṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4625: naca siddhānte tvagātmasaṃbandhasya vyāpitvātkaṇṭakasaṃbandhe dehavyāpivedanāprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4627: na caivaṃ viṣayatvaksaṃbandha eva taddheturastu kimātmavyāptyeti vācyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4629: na caiṣāṃ vyāpakānāṃ kāryāṇāmalpamupādānaṃ saṃbhavati kāryasyopādānādviśleṣānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4642: pūrvaṃ caitanyasya guṇatvamupetya tadvyāptyā guṇyātmāṇutvaṃ nirastaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4647: 'antarā vijñānamanasī hṛdi hi'iti ca prakṛtā buddhiryogyatvāttacchabdena parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:4651: akāryakāraṇadravyasamānādhikaraṇatayā tattvamasīti vākyasya so 'yamiti vākyavadakhaṇḍābhedārthatvādānantyaṃ satyamaṇutvamadhyastamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:4656: buddherguṇena nimittenātmanyadhyasto guṇo bhavati tenātmaguṇenādhyastenaivārāgraparimāṇo 'pakṛṣṭaśca jīvo dṛṣṭaḥ svatastvananta evetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:4657: 'na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā nānyairdevaistapasā karmaṇā vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:4658: jñānaprasādena viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaḥ'ityuktvā 'eṣo 'ṇurātmā'ityuktaḥ para eva,
GSP33brsgor2u:4664: yadi caitanyaṃ prajñā tadā bhedopacāra ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4666: nanu caitanyaṃ guṇa iti bhedo mukhyo 'stu, netyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4678: yāvadātmabhāvitvāc ca na doṣas taddarśanāt / BBs_2,3.30 /
GSP33brsgor2u:4679: nanu svataḥ saṃsāritvamastu kiṃ buddhyupādhinetyata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4681: samāno buddhitādātmyāpannaḥ san vijñānaṃ brahma tanmayo vikāro 'ṇurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4706: svāpe bījātmanā sato buddhayādeḥ prabodhe 'bhivyaktirityatra śrutimāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4719: ' 'cittaṃ ca cetayitavyam'iti tatra tatra śrutiṣu manaādipadavācyaṃ tāvadbuddhidravyaṃ prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4722: garvavṛttiko 'haṅkāro vijñānaṃ citpradhānaṃ smṛtipradhānaṃ vā cittamityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4723: yadyapi sākṣipratyakṣasiddhamantaḥkaraṇaṃ śrutyanūditaṃ ca tathāpi pratyakṣaśrutyorvivadamānaṃ prati vyāsaṅgānupapattyā tatsādhayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4727: pañcendriyāṇāṃ pañcaviṣayasaṃbandhe sati nityaṃ yugapatpañcopalabdhayaḥ syuḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4731: nanu satyapi kāragrisaṃyoge dāhakādācitkatvavadupalabdhikādācitkatvamastu kiṃ manasetyāśaṅkyānyataraniyamo vetyetadvyācaṣṭe-
GSP33brsgor2u:4733: satyāṃ sāmagryāṃ nityopalabdhirvāṅgīkāryā anyatarasya kāraṇasya kenapicchaktipratibandhaniyamo vāṅgīkāryaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4742: tathāhi-rasādīnāṃ sahopalabdhiprāptau rasabubhutsārūpo vyāsaṅgo rūpādyupalabdhipratibandhako vācyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4744: tatrātmano 'saṅganirguṇakūṭasthasya guṇitvāyogānmana eva guṇitvenaiṣṭavyamiti vyāsaṅgānupapattyā manaḥsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4750: teṣāṃ mate punaricchādīnāmātmadharmatvaṃ teṣāṃ mano durlabhamiti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4765: sa nityaścidrūpo mahānātmā kartā na vetyasaṅgatvaśrutīnāṃ vidhyādiśrutīnāṃ ca vipratipattyā
GSP33brsgor2u:4776: nanu buddhikartṛtvena śāstrārthavattāstu kiṃ jīvakartṛtvena tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4778: mayedaṃ kartavyamiti bodhasamarthasya cetanasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ vācyaṃ na tvacetanāyā buddheḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4779: kiṃ ca bhokturātmana eva kartṛtā vācyā 'śāstraphalaṃ prayoktari'iti nyāyāditi bhāvaḥ //33//
GSP33brsgor2u:4784: amṛtaḥ sa ātmā yatheṣṭamīyate gacchatīti vihāropadeśāt, ātmā kartā //34//
GSP33brsgor2u:4788: prāṇānāṃ madhye vijñānena buddhyā vijñānasamarthamindriyajātamādāya śete iti prāṇān gṛhītvā parivartata iti upādānakartṛtvamātmanaḥ akartṛtve upādānānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ //35//
GSP33brsgor2u:4791: vyapadeśāc ca kriyāyāṃ na cen nirdeśaviparyayaḥ / BBs_2,3.36 /
GSP33brsgor2u:4792: vijñānaśabdo jīvasya nirdeśo na cet tadā prathamānirdeśādviparyayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4794: tasmādiha śrutau tanuta ityākhyātena kartṛvācinā vijñānapadasya sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśātkriyāyāmātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ sūcyata iti sūtrabhāṣyayorarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:4802: satyapi svātantrye kārakavaicitryādaniyatā pravṛttiriti sūtreṇa pariharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4808: nanvātmā viṣayasaṃbandhāya karaṇānyapekṣate cetkathaṃ svatantra ityāśaṅkyamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4812: kiṃ tu svetarakārakaprayoktṛtve sati kārakāpreryatvaṃ svātantryaṃ tena svatantro
GSP33brsgor2u:4824: sa kartā sa eva jīvo yattadapekṣitaṃ karaṇaṃ tanmana iti jīvakartṛtvasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ //38//
GSP33brsgor2u:4838: sāṃkhyanirāsenātmanaḥ kartṛtve sādhite bādhakābhāvāt tatsatyamiti mīmāṃsakādipakṣaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4840: ahaṃ kartetyanubhavasahitakartṛtvaśrutibalena tasyāgamasya stāvakatvāditi prāpta utsūtrameva siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4844: nanu kartṛtvaṃ nāma kriyāśaktirmuktāvapyasti tathāpi śaktikāryasya kriyārūpaśakyasyābhāvānmukteḥ puruṣārthatvasiddhiriti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:4850: asti hi pralaye 'pi kāryaṃ punarudbhavayogyaṃ sūkṣmaṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4851: tathāca śaktyā dharmādinimitteḥ sahitakāryākṣepānmuktilopa iti pariharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4853: sanimittasya kāryasya śakyatvena śaktyā saṃbandhānnamittānāmapi paramparayā śaktisaṃbandhitvamuktaṃ mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:4855: yadvā śaktirlakṣaṇamākṣepakaṃ yasya kāryasya tena kāryeṇa yaḥ saṃbandhasteneti vyadhikaraṇe tṛtīye /
GSP33brsgor2u:4871: buddhyādisaṃghātādvyatirikto yadi parasmādanyaścetano na syāttadā para eva saṃsārī prasajyeta,
GSP33brsgor2u:4875: na vayaṃ śuddhasya ciddhātoḥ parasya bandhaṃ vadāmaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4876: kintu tasyaivāvidyābuddhyādiprativimbitasyāvidyayā bhinnasya jīvatvaṃ prāptasya bandhamokṣāviti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4877: kalpitabhedo 'pi loke bimbapratibimbayordharmavyavasthāpako dṛṣṭa iti pariharati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4892: ātmā svato 'kartā buddhyādyupādhinā tu kartetyubhayathābhāva uktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4896: yathā sphaṭikasya lauhityaṃ kusumādyupādhikaṃ tathātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ buddhyādyupādhikamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ siddham /
GSP33brsgor2u:4897: naca tau buddherātmakartṛtve karaṇatvaviṣayau nopādānatvaviṣayāviti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4900: nanu takṣā svahastādinā vāsyādipreraṇaśaktatvātsvataḥ kartā ātmā tu niravayavatvādaśakta iti dṛṣṭāntavaiṣamyamāśaṅkyaupādhikakartṛtvāṃśena vivakṣitena
GSP33brsgor2u:4902: śāstreṇānūdyamānaṃ kartṛtvaṃ svābhāvikameva kiṃ na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4906: kiñca karaṇairviśiṣṭasya kartṛtve teṣāṃ kartrantarbhāvātteṣvapi kartṛvibhaktiḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:4923: pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ jīva ityaṅgīkṛtya jīvasya kartṛtve tanuta iti śrutiruktā,
GSP33brsgor2u:4924: saṃprati tayā śrutyānupahitātmanaḥ kartṛtvamiti prāptau vijñānaṃ buddhireva tasyā evātra kartṛtvamucyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:4927: 'yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ'ityādiśrutiṣu vijñānabdasya buddhau prasiddhatvādatra ca manomayakośānantaraṃ paṭhitatvācchraddhādiliṅgācca buddhireva vijñānamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4930: 'mahadyakṣaṃ prathamajam'ityādiśrutau hiraṇyagarbhabrahmātmakabuddherjyeṣṭhatvokteratra devairindriyairūpāsyamānaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ brahma vijñānaṃ buddhirevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4932: kiñca śrutyantare yajñasya buddhikāryatvokteratrāpi yajñakartṛvijñānaṃ buddhirityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4934: cittena dhyātvā vācā mantroktyā yajño jāyate tataścittasya vācaḥ pūrvottarabhāvo yajña ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4940: tarhi buddhyādīnāṃ kartṛtve karaṇatvavārtā teṣu na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4942: yathā kāṣṭhānāṃ svavyāpāre kartṛtve 'pi pākāpekṣayā karaṇatvaṃ tathā buddhyādīnāmadhyavasāyasaṃkalpādikriyākartṛtve 'pyupalabdhyapekṣayā karaṇatvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:4946: yasya yo vyāpāraḥ sa tasya karteti sthiterityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4948: upalabdhernityatve buddhyādīnāṃ kathaṃ karaṇatvamuktamiti ceducyate-akhaṇḍasākṣicaitanyaṃ buddhivṛttibhirbhinnaṃ sadviṣayāvācchinnatvena jāyate,
GSP33brsgor2u:4949: tathāca viṣayāvacchinnacaitanyākhyopalabdhau buddhyādīnāṃ karaṇatvaṃ buddhyādyupahitātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ na kevalasya,
GSP33brsgor2u:4950: naca buddhereva tatkartṛtvaṃ caitanyasya jaḍavyāpāratvāyogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4951: yaccoktaṃ buddheḥ kartṛtve sa evāhandhīgamyo jīva iti tasya karaṇāntaraṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4952: tathāca nāmamātre vivāda iti tatra kevalātmanaḥ kartṛtvamuktamiti bhrāntiṃ nirasyati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4954: sāṃkhyanirāsārthaṃ buddhyabhedenādhyastacidātmakāhaṅkāragataṃ kartṛtvaṃ yaduktaṃ tadahandhīgamyasya buddhiviśiṣṭātmana eva na kevalasya sākṣiṇo
GSP33brsgor2u:4956: evaṃ viśiṣṭātmanaḥ kartṛtve viśeṣaṇībhūtāyā jaḍabuddhereva karaṇatvopapatterna karaṇāntarakalpanāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4957: adhyāsaṃ vinā kevalabuddhikartṛtvavādinastu karaṇāntaraprasaṅgo durvāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:4964: yathā sphaṭike lauhityādhyāse lohitadravyaṃ karaṇaṃ tenāyaṃ sphaṭiko lohita ityanubhavāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:4966: tadadhyastaṃ kartṛtvamupajīvya jīvasya kārakasaṃpannatvādīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaśruteśca saṃśayamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4976: pūrvaṃ jīvasya dharmādharmavattvaṃ siddhavatkṛtya tatsāpekṣatvādviṣamajagatkartṛtvamaviruddhamityuktaṃ saṃprati īśvarādhīnatve jīvasya kartṛtve siddhe dharmādharmavattvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4978: īśvarasya kārayitṛtve siddhe jīvasya kartṛtvasiddhiriti cakrakāpatteḥ karmasāpekṣatvaṃ na saṃbhavatītyucyata ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:4982: anapekṣasya pravartakatve dharmavato narān duḥkhenādharmavataḥ sukhena yojayet,
GSP33brsgor2u:4983: kāruṇikatve vā sarve sukhena ekarūpāḥ syuruti jagadvaicitryaṃ vidhyādiśāstraṃ ca na syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:4984: tasmādvidhyādiśāstrārthavattvāya rāgadveṣāyattaṃ svata eva jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:4986: īśvarastāvikā vā sā śrutiriti prāpte siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:4988: yathā candanādisāmagryāṃ satyāṃ dharmavyatirike sukhavyatirekagrahābhāve 'pi 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati'ityādiśāstraprāmāṇyādeva dharmasya
GSP33brsgor2u:4994: yadi viśeṣahetūnāṃ sādhāraṇahetvapekṣatvānna vaiyarthyaṃ tarhi īśvarasyāpi sādhāraṇahetutvānna vaiyarthyamityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5000: kimīśvarasya kārayitṛtve jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ na syādityāpādyate uta cakrakāpattirvā /
GSP33brsgor2u:5006: anavadyaṃ jīvasya kartṛtvamīśvarasya kārayitṛtvaṃ ceti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5012: tayoḥ sthāne sa eva niyujyeta abhiṣicyeta /
GSP33brsgor2u:5013: tayoḥ kāryaṃ sa eva kuryāditi yāvat /
GSP33brsgor2u:5019: tasmāt karmasāpekṣeśvarasya kārayitṛtvāt 'eṣa hyeva'ityādiśrutervidhyādiśrutyavirodha iti siddham //42//
GSP33brsgor2u:5022: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke / BBs_2,3.43 /
GSP33brsgor2u:5024: nityaḥ svaprakāśo 'naṇurakartā jīva'iti śodhitatvaṃpadārthasyātra brahmaikyasādhanena bhedābhedaśrutīnāṃ virodhasamādhānātpādasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5029: prasiddhasvasvāmitvasaṃbandhasaṃbhavādyaḥ kaścit saṃbandha ityaniyamo na yukta ityarucerāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5034: lokasiddhānarthātmakabhedānuvāditvena bhedaśrutīnāṃ durbalatvādajñātaphalavadabhedaśrutyanusāreṇa prakalpitabhedanibandhanoṃ'śāṃśibhāvaḥ saṃbandha iti siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:5036: agneḥ sāṃśatve 'pi niṣkaleśvarasya kathaṃ sāṃśatvamata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5039: bheda eva cetsvasvāmibhāvo yukto nāṃśāṃśibhāva iti śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:5043: vañcasi gacchasi yadāste yo nāmarūpe nirmāya praviśya vyavaharanvartate taṃ vidvānamṛto bhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5050: asya sahasraśīrṣapuruṣasya tāvānprapañco mahimā vibhūtiḥ puruṣastasmātprapañcāt jyāyānmahattaraḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5055: atra bhūtaśabdasya prāṇiṣu prayogātsūtroktamantre 'pi tatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5066: aupādhike īśvarasya niyantṛtve jīva eva tanniyantā kiṃ na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5092: bhrāntau satyāṃ duḥkhamityanvayamuktvā bhrāntyabhāve duḥkhābhāvadarśanācca bhrāntikṛtaṃ duḥkhamiti niścīyata ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5095: jīvasyāpi samyagjñāne duḥkhābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ kimu vācyaṃ nityasarvajñeśvarasyetyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5097: evamaṃśitve hetoḥ sopādhikatvamuktvā yoṃ'śī sa vastutaḥ svāṃśadharmavānitī vyāptiṃ sthalatraye vyabhicārayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:5102: kiñca jīvasyeśvarasya vā vastuto duḥkhitvānumānaṃ na yuktamāgamabādhādityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5113: daśendriyāṇi pañca prāṇāḥ mano buddhiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5118: yato bāhyo 'saṅgastasmānna lipyate evamaṃśitvakṛtamīśvare doṣaṃ nirasyāṃśa ityuktaṃ jīvasyāṃśatvaṃ dehādyupādhikamiti sphuṭayitumatyantasvarūpaikyamādāyākṣipati-
GSP33brsgor2u:5122: niravayavabrahmaṇo mukhyāṃśo na saṃbhavatīti vadatā siddhāntinā bhedo nāstītyuktaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsgor2u:5131: nanu bhrānteḥ kutaścinnivṛttau vyavahāravicchedaḥ syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5152: ajñasyāpi bhrāntyabhāvakāle niyojyatvaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ kimu vācyamātmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5155: viṣayavairāgyasya jñānārthamabhyastasya jñānānantaramanuvṛttyā viṣayeṣu pravartakarāganivṛtternātiprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5171: tasmātsvargī narakī ceti vyavasthāsiddhaye ātmasvarūpabhedo vācya iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5172: bhavettadā sāṃkaryaṃ yadyanupahitātmana eva bhoktṛtvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:5176: tathāca buddheḥ paradehāsaṃbandhāttadupahitajīvasya nāsti paradehasaṃbandha iti buddhibhedena bhoktṛbhedānna karmādisāṃkaryamiti samādhānārthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:5181: saṃprati evakāreṇāvacchedapakṣāruciṃ sūcayan 'rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva'ityādiśrutisiddhaṃpratibimbapakṣamupanyasyati bhagavān sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33brsgor2u:5188: asmin pakṣe buddhipratibimbabhedātsvargī nārakītyādivyavasthā jīvatvasyāvidyakatvādvidyayā mokṣaścetyupapadyata ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5190: yastvayaṃ bhāskarasya pralāpaḥ pratibimbasya nopādhisaṃsṛṣṭatayā kalpitatvaṃ kintu svarūpeṇaiva,
GSP33brsgor2u:5191: ataḥ kalpitapratibimbasya muktau sthityayogānna jīvatvamiti sa siddhāntarahasyājñānakṛta ityupekṣaṇīyaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5192: yadi darpaṇe mukhaṃ śuktau rajatavatkalpitaṃ syāttadā nedaṃ rajatamiti svarūpabādhavannedaṃ mukhamiti bādhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:5204: sarveṣāṃ puṃsāṃ prakṛtisāṃnidhyādyaviśeṣe 'pi prakṛtireva pratipuruṣaṃ niyamena bhogāpavargārthaṃ pravartate,
GSP33brsgor2u:5206: anyathā niyatapravṛttyanaṅgīkāre svamāhātmyakhyāpanārthā pradhānasya pravṛttirityuddeśyavighātaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5210: yo hi niyāmakabhāvenoddeśyavighātamāpādayati taṃ prati tasyaivāpādanamiṣṭamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5215: yadātmādṛṣṭakṛto yo manaḥsaṃyogaḥ sa tadātmana eva sukhādiheturiti vyavasthāṃ śaṅkate-
GSP33brsgor2u:5242: kāryamabhisaṃdhyādikaṃ yasyātmano yaccharīraṃ tatra tasyaiva bhoga iti vyavasthāmāśaṅkyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5246: yasminnātmapradeśe 'dṛṣṭotpattiḥ sa kiṃ calaḥ sthito vā /
GSP33brsgor2u:5248: dvitīye tasminneva pradeśe parasyāpi bhogadarśanādadṛṣṭamastītyekenāpi śarīreṇa dvayorātmanorbhogaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5250: kiñca yattu yatrātmanaḥ pradeśe śarīrādisaṃyogādadṛṣṭamutpannaṃ tattatraivācalapradeśe
GSP33brsgor2u:5251: sthitamiti svargādiśarīrāvacchinnātmanyadṛṣṭābhāvādbhogo na syādataḥ pradeśabhedo na vyavasthāpakaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5255: yadapi kecidāhuḥ-manasa ekatve 'pyātmanāṃ bhedena saṃyogavyaktīnāṃ bhedātkayācitsaṃyogavyaktyā kasmiṃścedevātmanyadṛṣṭādikamityasāṃkaryamiti
GSP33brsgor2u:5270: tathāca devadattātmā yajñadattātmano na bhinnaḥ ātmatvāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:5273: nityadravyamātravṛttayo viśeṣāste ca svayaṃ svāśrayavyāvartakā eva na sveṣāṃ vyāvartakamapekṣanta ityantyā ucyante /
GSP33brsgor2u:5281: yattu bahūnāṃ vibhutve ākāśadikkālā dṛṣṭānta iti so 'pyasaṃmata ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5288: evaṃ bhūtabhoktṛśrutīnāṃ virodhābhāvādbrahmaṇyadvaye samanvaya iti siddham //53//
GSP33brsgor2u:5290: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ //3//
GSP33brsgor2u:5295: pūrvādhikaraṇe kartuḥ svarūpaṃ vicārya tadupakaraṇānāmindriyāṇāmutpatti sādhayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:5297: bhūtabhoktṛvicārānantaraṃ bhautikaprāṇavicāra iti hetuhetumadbhāvaṃ pādayoḥ saṃgatimāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5304: te kimutpadyante na veti śrutīnāṃ vipratipattyā saṃśaye tāsāṃ samabalatvādanirṇaya ityaprāmāṇyamiti pūrvapakṣaphalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:5317: yadyapyadṛṣṭavatprāṇā apyaniyatā iti sūtramanveti tathāpi punaruktam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5328: kimiyaṃ vāruṇīṣṭirdāturuta pratigrahīturiti viśaye 'pratigṛhṇīyāt'iti śruteḥ pratigrahīturityāśaṅkya
GSP33brsgor2u:5330: ataḥ pratigṛhṇīyādityasya padasyāśvān yaḥ pratigrāhayedityarthaḥ dadyāditi yāvat /
GSP33brsgor2u:5331: 'yo 'śvadātā sa vāruṇīmiṣṭiṃ kuryāt'iti vākyārthe sthite cintā-aśvadānanimitteyamiṣṭiḥ kiṃ laukike 'śvadāne vaidike veti /
GSP33brsgor2u:5334: syāditi sūtreṇa prāpte siddhāntaḥ-'atra hi varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇāti'iti
GSP33brsgor2u:5337: naca laukike 'śvadāne 'yaṃ rogo bhavati iti prasiddham /
GSP33brsgor2u:5340: naca vṛṇotīti vyutpattyā varuṇaśabdo niṣedhātikramakṛtadoṣānuvādaka iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:5342: tattyāge ca vaidike 'pi dāne 'śvatyāgajanyaduḥkhaṃ prāptamuktavyutpattyā śaknotyanuvadituṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:5345: somapāne kriyamāṇe vyāpadvamanaṃ yadi syāttadā 'etaṃ saumendraṃ śyāmākaṃ caruṃ nirvapet'iti śrūyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:5347: tadvallaukike dhātusāmyārthaṃ pītasomasya vamane 'yaṃ caruḥ syādvamananimittendriyaśoṣākhyadoṣasya
GSP33brsgor2u:5348: dṛṣṭasya 'indriyeṇa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ vamati'ityanuvādāditi pūrvapakṣasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5349: vaidike tu somapāne śeṣapratipatterjātatvādvamane 'pina doṣa iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5351: vede tu 'mā me vāṅnābhimatigāḥ'iti sāmyagjaraṇārthamantraliṅgādvamane karmavaiguṇyāttasya doṣatā /
GSP33brsgor2u:5356: nanu pratijñāpi gauṇī kaṃ na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5364: nedaṃ vākyaṃ mahāpralaye paramakāraṇasya brahmaṇaḥ prāṇavattvaparaṃ kintvavāntarapralaye hiraṇyagarbhākhyāvāntaraprakṛtirūpaprāṇasadbhāvaparamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:5365: nanu hiraṇyagarbharūpavikārasya sattve kathaṃ tadā vikārāsattvakathanaṃ, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5368: nanu yathāśruti mahāpralaye prāṇasadbhāvarūpaṃ liṅgaṃ prāṇānutpattisādhakaṃ kimityavāntarapralayaparatayā
GSP33brsgor2u:5369: nīyata iti cet 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ'ityādi prabalajanmaśrutibalāditi vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5370: nanu vikārasya brahmaṇaḥ kathaṃ prakṛtitvamityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5372: 'hiraṇyagarbheḥ samavartatāgre'ityādiśrutau 'ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ'ityādi smṛtau ca vikārātmanāmapi mūlakāraṇāvasthārūpāṇāṃ brahmavirāḍādīnāṃ prakṛtivikārabhāvena prasiddhirasti /
GSP33brsgor2u:5380: tasya jāyata iti padasyākāśādiṣu mukhyasya pāṭhāpekṣayā prācīneṣu prāṇeṣu śrutermukhyaṃ janmeti sūtrayojanā-
GSP33brsgor2u:5383: ekasminvākye ekasya śabdasya kvacinmukhyatvaṃ kvacidgauṇatvamiti vairūpyaṃ na yuktamiti nyāyamanyatrāpyatidiśati-
GSP33brsgor2u:5388: yaccoktaṃ chāndogye 'pi prāṇānāmutpattirna śrūyata iti, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5393: atra mayaḍvikāre mukhya iti pakṣe vartata eva prāṇānāṃ brahmakāryatvaṃ tejobannānāṃ brahmavikāratvāt /
GSP33brsgor2u:5395: vikāratve bhūtādhīnasthitikatvaṃ liṅgaṃ mayaṭoktamiti siddhaṃ brahmakāryatvaṃ 'sa
GSP33brsgor2u:5397: tasmātprāṇānāmutpattiśrutīnāṃ sadbhāvaśrutyavirodhātkāraṇe brahmaṇi samanvaya iti siddham /
GSP33brsgor2u:5402: evaṃ janmalabdhasattākānāṃ prāṇānāmupajīvyopajīvakatvasaṃgatyā sāṃkhyāṃ nirṇetuṃ śrutīnāṃ virodhātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:5406: pañca dhīndriyāṇi vāṅmanaśceti sapta prāṇā eta eva hastena sahāṣṭau /
GSP33brsgor2u:5408: gṛhṇanti badhnantīti grahā indriyāṇi teṣāṃ bandhakatvaṃ viṣayādhīnamityatigrahāḥ grahānatikrāntā viṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5409: dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣi dve ghrāṇe vākceti sapta śīrṣṇi bhavāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāñcau pāyūpasthau ceti nava,
GSP33brsgor2u:5410: jñānakarmendriyāṇi daśeme puruṣe dehe prāṇāḥ ātmā mana ekādaśa prāṇā iti siddhāntakoṭiruktā /
GSP33brsgor2u:5413: śrutitaḥ saptatvāvagaterye śīrṣaṇyāḥ sapta te prāṇā iti śīrṣaṇyoddeśena prāṇatvaviśeṣaṇādvā śīrṣaṇyānāṃ prāṇatvaśabditā,
GSP33brsgor2u:5428: tato varaṃ prāthamikasaptatve 'ntarbhāvaḥ lāghavāditi prāpte siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:5433: ato 'dhikasaṃkhyāyā nyūnāyāmantarbhāvāyogātsaptaiva prāṇāḥ syurlāghavānurodhādityevaṃ na mantavyamityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5436: 'śrutīnāṃ mitho virodhe sati mānāntarānugṛhītā śrutirbalīyasī'iti nyāyena kāryaliṅgānumānānugṛhītaikādaśaprāṇaśrutyanusāreṇānyāḥ śrutayo neyā
GSP33brsgor2u:5446: teṣāṃ tadvṛttitve badhirādīnāmādānādi na syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5447: kathaṃ tarhi chidre prāṇaśabda ityāśaṅkya lakṣaṇayetyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5452: nanvidaṃ sūtravyākhyānamasaṃgataṃ pañcadhīndriyāvāṅmanasāṃ saptatvāvagatiḥ śīrṣaṇyānāṃ caturṇāṃ viśeṣitatvamiti hetorvaiyadhikaraṇyāduktaparisaṃkhyādoṣāccetyarucerāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5456: taṃ jīvātmānaṃ ye prāṇāḥ saha gacchanti teṣāmeva bhogahetutvādindriyatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5457: vipannāvasthāyāmeva cākṣupaścakṣuṣi sthito 'nugrāhakasūryāṃśarūpaḥ puruṣaḥ parāṅ paryāvartate bahirdeśātsvāṃśinaṃ surye pratigacchati /
GSP33brsgor2u:5459: devāṃśe devaṃ praviṣṭe liṅgāṃśaścakṣurhṛdaye manasaikībhavati tadāyaṃ na paśyatīti pārśvasthā āhurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5460: ādipadāt 'na jighrati na vadati na ramayate na śṛṇoti na manute na spṛśati na vijānāti'iti gṛhyate /
GSP33brsgor2u:5467: kāmaḥ karma ceti puryaṣṭakamātmano jñāpakatvālliṅgaṃ sati saṃbhave sarvaśrutisaṃkoco na yukta ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5474: 'prāṇāḥ sarve 'nantāḥ'iti śruterindriyāṇāṃ vibhutvātteṣāmutkrāntirasiddhā kintu tattaddehe teṣāmabhivyaktirūpāḥ prādeśikyo vṛttayaḥ santi na tāsāmutkrāntyādiriti sāṃkhyānāmākṣepaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:5475: tatsaṃgatyā prāṇāḥ kiṃparimāṇā iti saṃdehe siddhāntayati-
GSP33brsgor2u:5491: nanu prāṇo jāyate na veti saṃśayābhāvādatideśo na yukta ityākṣipati-
GSP33brsgor2u:5496: tarhi tadā pralayakāle mṛtyurmārako mṛtyumatkāryaṃ vā nāsīt,
GSP33brsgor2u:5498: rātryāḥ praketaścihnarūpaścandraḥ ahnaḥ praketaḥ sūryaśca nāstāṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:5501: yadvā svena dhṛtā māyā svadhā tayā saha tadekaṃ brahmānīdāsīditi paramārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5503: tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ paraḥ paramutkṛṣṭamanyacca kimapi na babhūvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5504: parihāraḥ subodhaḥ nanu śreṣṭhaśabdasya prāṇe prasiddhyabhāvātkathaṃ sūtramiti, tatrāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5518: mukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃ vāyumātramuta karaṇānāṃ sādhāraṇavyāpāra āhosvittattvāntaramiti vāyuprāṇayorbhedābhedaśrutīnāṃ mithovirodhātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5525: tatra prāṇo vāyunādhidaivikena bhātyabhivyañjyate abhivyaktaḥ saṃstapati /
GSP33brsgor2u:5527: śrutiṣu tatra tatra prāṇasya vāgādīnāṃ ca mithaḥ saṃvādaliṅgena pṛthagutpattiliṅgena cendriyatadabhinnavyāpārebhyo 'pi bhinnatvamityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5531: yā cakṣuḥ-sādhyā vṛttiḥ saiva na śrotrādisādhyā,
GSP33brsgor2u:5538: kiñca prāṇasya vṛttitve vāgādīnāmeva prādhānyaṃ vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:5541: yathā mṛdo ghaṭo na vastvantaraṃ nāpi mṛṇmātraṃ tadvikāratvāt,
GSP33brsgor2u:5544: dehaṃ prāptaḥ pañcāvastho vikārātmanā sthito vāyureva prāṇa ityarthaḥ //9//
GSP33brsgor2u:5554: yathā bṛhadrathantarayoḥ sarvatra sahaprayujyamānatvena sāmatvena vā sāmyātsahapāṭhastathā karaṇaiḥ sahopakaraṇatvena sāmyātprāṇasya pāṭha iti na hetvasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5560: akaraṇatvāc ca na doṣas tathā hi darśayati / BBs_2,4.11 /
GSP33brsgor2u:5561: nanu yadbhogopakaraṇaṃ tatsaviṣayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā cakṣurādikaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:5565: nirviṣayasyāpi prāṇasya śarīravadbhogopakaraṇatvamakṣataṃ na tu cakṣurādivajjñānakarmakaraṇatvamasti
GSP33brsgor2u:5576: tena prāṇena yadaśnāti jīvastvena prāṇakṛtāśaneneti yāvat /
GSP33brsgor2u:5585: kāmādivṛttivajjñāne 'pi pañcatvaniyamo nāstītyaruciṃ svayamevodbhāvya pakṣāntaraṃ gṛhṇāti-
GSP33brsgor2u:5607: śrutyā vibhutvamiti virodhe ādhyātmikaprāṇasyālpatvamādhidaivikasya vibhutvamiti viṣayabhedācchrutyoravirodha iti samādhatte-
GSP33brsgor2u:5609: kiñcopakrame prāṇasya pluṣyādisamatvenālpatvokteḥ sama ebhistribhirlokairiti virāḍdehasāmyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5621: 'vācā hi nāmānyabhivadati cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyati'iti tṛtīyāśrutyānvayavyatirekavatyā
GSP33brsgor2u:5624: naca svakārye śaktānāmapi vāgādīnāmacetanatvādadhiṣṭhātrapekṣā na virudhyata iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor2u:5627: tathā caikatrānekabhoktṛṇāṃ virodhāddurbalasya jīvasya bhoktṛtvaṃ na syāditi pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5633: vāyuḥ prāṇādhiṣṭhātā bhūtvā nāsāpuṭe prāviśaditi vyākhyeyamityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5639: sa prāṇo vācaṃ prathamāmudgīthakarmaṇi pradhānāmanṛtādipāpmarūpaṃ mṛtyumatītyāvahanmṛtyunā muktāṃ kṛtvā agnidevatātmatvaṃ prāpitavānityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor2u:5640: kiñca mṛtasyāgniṃ vāgapyeti vātaṃ prāṇaḥ cakṣurādityamityādiśrutirapyadhiṣṭhātradhiṣṭheyatvasaṃbandhaṃ dyotayatītyāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5654: atha dehe prāṇapraveśānantaraṃ yatra golake etacchidramanupraviṣṭaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:5655: tatra cakṣuṣyabhimānī sa ātmā cākṣuṣaḥ tasya rūpadarśanāya cakṣuḥ yadyapyātmā karaṇānyepakṣate
GSP33brsgor2u:5656: tathāpi jñeyajñānatadāśrayāhaṅkārānyo veda sa ātmā cidrūpa eva,
GSP33brsgor2u:5657: karaṇāni tu gandhādipravṛttaye 'pekṣyante na caitanyāyeti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5658: kiñca yo 'haṃ rūpamadrākṣaṃ sa evāhaṃ śṛṇomīti pratisaṃdhānādekaḥ śārīra eva bhoktā na bahavo devā ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5663: kadāciddevānāmatrabhoktṛtvaṃ kadācijjīvasyetyaniyamo 'stvityāśaṅkya svakarmārjite dehe jīvasya bhoktṛtvaniyamānmaivamityāha-sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33brsgor2u:5668: yathā pradīpādiḥ karaṇopakārakatayā karaṇapakṣasyāntargatastathā devāḥ karaṇopakāriṇa eva na bhoktāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5670: devānāṃ tu karaṇopakārābhijñātayā sārathivadadhiṣṭhātṛtvamiti na jīvenānyathāsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5671: devānāmadhiṣṭhātṛtvenāsmindehe bhoktṛtvānumānaṃ tu 'na ha vai devān pāpaṃ gacchati'ityuktaśrutibādhitam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5672: tasmāt 'cakṣuṣā hi rūpāṇi paśyati'iti śruteḥ sādhanatvamātrabodhitvādagnirvāgbhūtvetyādyadhiṣṭhātṛdevatāpekṣābodhakaśrutibhiravirodha iti siddham
GSP33brsgor2u:5675: ta indriyāṇi tadvyapadeśād anyatra śreṣṭhāt / BBs_2,4.17 /
GSP33brsgor2u:5681: hanta idānīmasyaiva mukhyaprāṇasya sarve vayaṃ svarūpaṃ bhavāmeti saṃkalpya te vāgādayastathābhavannityabhedaśrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5686: te prāṇāḥ śreṣṭhādanyatra anye iti pratijñārthatvena padatrayaṃ vyācaṣṭe-
GSP33brsgor2u:5701: siddhānte manasaḥ pramopādānatvādātmavadanindriyatvamiṣṭaṃ tato notsargabādha iti kecit /
GSP33brsgor2u:5702: kiñca 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca'iti pṛthagjanmavyapadeśātsvatantravastubheda ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5704: ekasmin vākye prāṇa indriyaśabdamaikyāllabhate punaruktibhayānna labhate ceti vyāghāta ityarthaḥ //17//
GSP33brsgor2u:5709: bhedaśruteriti sūtreṇa prakaraṇabhedo heturukta iti na paunaruktyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5710: te ha devāḥ śāstrīyendriyamanovṛttirūpā asurāṇāṃ pāpavṛttirūpāṇāṃ jayārthamudgīthakarmaṇi
GSP33brsgor2u:5712: vācamanṛtādidoṣeṇa vidhvaṃsitavantosurā ityevaṃ krameṇa sarveṣvindriyeṣu pāpagrasteṣu
GSP33brsgor2u:5713: paścādatheti prakaraṇaṃ vicchidya prasiddhamāsye bhavamāsanyaṃ mukhyaṃ prāṇamūcustanna
GSP33brsgor2u:5714: tadgāyeti tena prāṇenodagātrā nirviṣayatayā saṅgadoṣaśūnyenāsurā naṣṭā ityasurāṇāṃ
GSP33brsgor2u:5726: etadeva prāṇaśabdasyendriyeṣu lakṣaṇābījaṃ śrutau 'tasmādeta etenākhyāyanta'iti parāmṛṣṭam,
GSP33brsgor2u:5731: utpattirutpādaneti ca kāryakartrorvyāpārau prasiddhau tatra jagadutpattiśrutivirodhaḥ atītena pādadvayaina nirastaḥ,
GSP33brsgor2u:5741: hanta idānīṃ devatāḥ sūkṣmā anupraviśyeti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5742: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā /
GSP33brsgor2u:5744: evaṃ sthūlīkṛteṣu bhūteṣu prāṇināṃ vyavahāraḥ setsyatīti paradevatāyāstātparyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5747: pūrvapakṣe jīvasyaiva bhautikasraṣṭṛtvādbrahmaṇaḥ sarvasraṣṭṛtvāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5750: paradevatāyā akartṛtve kathamuttamapuruṣaprayoga ityāśaṅkya prayojakatvātkartṛtvopacāra ityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5759: nanu tarhi praveśakriyā jīvakartṛkā vyākaraṇamīśvarakartṛkamiti kartṛbhedāt kṛtvāpratyayo na syādityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5761: vastutastu sūryo jale praviṣṭa iti pratibimbabhāvākhyapraveśe sūryasyaiva kartṛtvaprayogājjīvātmanā praveśe 'pīśvara eva karteti kṛtvāśrutiryukteti bodhyam /
GSP33brsgor2u:5762: nanvabhedaścejjīva eva vyākartā kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkya kalpanayā bhinnasya tasyāśaktatvācchrutivirodhācca maivamityāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5764: pratyekaṃ mahābhūtasargasya prāguktatvādiha vyākaraṇavākye yatnapūrvakaṃ sthīlabhautikasarga ucyata iti pāṭhavyatyayena sūtrasūcitaṃ śrutyarthamāha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5771: nanvagnyādīnāṃ taijasānāmeva śrutāvudāharaṇadbhūjalayosatryātmakatvaṃ na vivakṣitamityata āha-
GSP33brsgor2u:5774: yatkapotarūpādikaṃ kṛṣṇatvādiviśeṣākāreṇa vijñātamiva bhavati taddevatānāṃ samudāyarūpamityarthaḥ //20//
GSP33brsgor2u:5781: uttarasūtreṇāśaṅkitaṃ doṣaṃ nirasitumādau śaṅkāviṣayamādhyātmikatrivṛtkaraṇaṃ darśayatīti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor2u:5796: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmadgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ dvitīyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
